T02D1654:166b-1: shr'i buddha ka p'a la ma h'a tantra r'a dza

T02D1654:167b-30: 'di'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang

T02D1654:169a-37: // mi shes pa rnams kyi rgyud dang sngags zlos

T02D1654:169b-26: dbang phyug ma ni thams cad du thogs pa med
T02D1654:169b-27: cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i nus pa dang ldan

T02D1654:170b-9: padma yang dag par sbyar ba'i dus na gang gi

T02D1654:170b-21: bu'i he ru ka ni 'bras bu'i rgyud de /

T02D1654:170b-23: kyi rgyud de mkha' lding gi sbyor ba la sogs

T02D1654:170b-25: rnams so // dngos su ba'i thabs ni phyag rgya

T02D1654:170b-27: 'byor las ji skad bshad par sgrub pa dang de'i

T02D1654:170b-35: rab tu rgyas par bshad pa ni //
T02D1654:170b-36: sems can kun la bde 'bab pa //
T02D1654:170b-38: dngos grub thams cad ces pa gang gi phyir 'di las dngos grub thams cad yin pa'o //
T02D1654:170b-39: rnal 'byor ma'i theg pa zhes pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud de /

T02D1654:171a-2: spar ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

T02D1654:171a-4: nang du ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1654:171a-5: mnan pa ni rten nyid kyi phyir padma'o //

T02D1654:171a-7: sgrib pa med pa'i bde ba chen po nyid kyis na bla na med pa'o //

T02D1654:171a-11: rnyed dka' ba ni le lo la sogs pas nye bar bcom pa rnams la'o //
T02D1654:171a-12: gsang ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa rnams la gsal bya min pa'o //
T02D1654:171a-13: de nyid kyi phyir mchog phul du byung ba ste /
T02D1654:171a-14: shes rab rno zhing bsod nams bsags pa rnams kho na'i yul 'di nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1654:171a-15: nyams dga' ba ni dga' ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //

T02D1654:171a-17: zhes pa thams cad du rgyun ma chad par nyams
T02D1654:171a-18: su myong ba'i phyir bde ba chen po yongs su

T02D1654:171a-23: pa nyid du dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa'i rig

T02D1654:171a-27: bskyed pa'i rim pa mdor ston pa //
T02D1654:171a-28: sngags sna tshogs zhes pa h'um yig la sogs pa bskyed pa'i sa bon no //
T02D1654:171a-29: ji ltar rigs pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i le'ur bshad pa'i cho ga yis so //
T02D1654:171a-30: rnal 'byor ma rnams ni sna tshogs sde ma la sogs kyi'o //
T02D1654:171a-31: ji bzhin 'byung ba ni ji ltar rigs par bskyed pa'o //
T02D1654:171a-32: he ru ka zhes pa dpa' bo chen po he ru ka'i'o //
T02D1654:171a-33: bskyed pa'i rgyu ni zla ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:171a-34: gnas pa'i rgyu ni chos 'byung la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:171a-35: bskyed pa'i rim pa 'di dang por bsgom par bya'o //

T02D1654:171b-3: lha nyid kyi ni sku bsgom pa //

T02D1654:171b-5: 'grub pa'i ched du nges par bstan //

T02D1654:171b-10: don du bskyed pa'i rim pa mdor bstan pa'i de

T02D1654:171b-16: dngos dang dngos med spros med pa'o //

T02D1654:171b-18: 'o na gzhan gyi don bya ba ma yin te /
T02D1654:171b-19: nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das pa bzhin no zhe na gsungs pa /

T02D1654:171b-21: sgrib pa med kyang gzhan gyi don du snying rje

T02D1654:171b-28: mya ngan mi 'da' bya bar nus //
T02D1654:171b-30: slar yang thabs kyi yan lag gsungs pa /
T02D1654:171b-31: dgongs pa'i skad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:171b-32: gzugs brnyan dag pa la sogs pa ral gri'i mthar
T02D1654:171b-33: thug pa ni las bcu gnyis rnams sngar dang phyi
T02D1654:171b-35: bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa dang rdzogs pa'i

T02D1654:171b-46: g-yeng ba las dngos grub gzhan du'o //
T02D1654:171b-48: 'dod pa lnga ni bsten bzhin pas //
T02D1654:172a-2: ; sgyu ma rnams ni thams cad la //
T02D1654:172a-3: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
T02D1654:172a-4: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba 'di //
T02D1654:172a-5: 'di kho na la gsal bar mtshon //
T02D1654:172a-6: zhes pa'i rigs pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams
T02D1654:172a-7: la nye bar spyod pa na gtso bo bud med

T02D1654:172a-9: rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir
T02D1654:172a-10: ro // de nas de'i don du ro tsa bar byed pa mdor bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1654:172a-11: 'jigs pa 'joms byed ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1654:172a-12: 'jigs pa rnam par rtog pa rnams lhan cig skyes
T02D1654:172a-13: pa 'char ba'i dus su nub par 'gro ba'i phyir
T02D1654:172a-15: g-yul chen po ni dga' rtsed sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D1654:172a-16: byed bzhin pa ni skyes pa gcig gis bud med
T02D1654:172a-17: 'bum las rgyal bar byed de ro tsa ba'i byed
T02D1654:172a-18: pas so // ci 'di ltar mthong ngam zhe na gsungs pa skyes pa gcig gis zhes te /
T02D1654:172a-19: skyes pa gcig 'dod pa chen po can du mthong
T02D1654:172a-20: ste 'phags pa chos 'phags la sogs pas bud med

T02D1654:172a-24: gcig gis zhes pa gcig pus thams cad ces thams cad ma rnams la'o //

T02D1654:172a-26: pa byang chub kyi sems 'ju bar byed pa dang

T02D1654:172a-30: ming ji bzhin zhes pa ji ltar rab tu grags par 'gyur ba de ltar bshad par bya'o //
T02D1654:172a-31: sh'a li k'a'i byed pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i
T02D1654:172a-32: byed pa ni rab tu rgyas par ston par 'gyur
T02D1654:172a-33: ro // rgyan po ni cho lo ste /
T02D1654:172a-34: de rtse bas dug gzhig par byed do //
T02D1654:172a-36: zin pa bud med kyis 'phrog pa'o //
T02D1654:172a-37: ka ra b'i ra'i shing gis mgo bo nas bzung nas rkang pa'i mthil ji srid par bsnun pa'o //
T02D1654:172a-38: zhags pa zhes pa zhags pa'i rnam pa'i thag pas mgrin par bcings nas 'gugs pa'o //
T02D1654:172a-39: khu byug gi sgra byed pa'o //
T02D1654:172b-0: padma 'byed pa zhes pa nang gi padma rnams @172b
T02D1654:172b-1: su rtsa ba'i 'don pa'i bsam pas man ngag ji
T02D1654:172b-3: gzhan ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'i rtse gnyis 'khrul 'khor du byed par smra'o //
T02D1654:172b-4: stag byed ni stag bzhin du bgrod pa'i tshul gyis 'chag pa'o //
T02D1654:172b-5: chu ni rab tu rgyas par ston par 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:172b-6: dung zhes pa ni dung gi sgra'o //

T02D1654:172b-8: gyis bzung ba'i ming bris pa las dug 'phrog pa'o
T02D1654:172b-9: // skyug pa zhes pa skyug par byed pa'o //
T02D1654:172b-10: ras kyi gos kyis g-yogs pa'o //
T02D1654:172b-11: thal lcag ces pa thal lcag gis bsnun pa'o //
T02D1654:172b-12: yig gsum zhes pa dha ka ka ra yis brdeg pa'o //
T02D1654:172b-13: ha ho hr'i: zhes pa'i yi ge gsum gyis dug 'jig pa'o zhes kha cig go //
T02D1654:172b-14: bsam gtan lta bas gtam zhes pa dkar po'i aa
T02D1654:172b-15: yig la sogs pa bsgom pa'i lta bas gtam bya
T02D1654:172b-16: ba'o zhes pa sbyor ba bco brgyad po 'di rnams
T02D1654:172b-18: rdzogs pa'i rim pa mdor bstan pa rgyas par ston te /

T02D1654:172b-21: ye shes ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1654:172b-22: ji bzhin pa ni gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin
T02D1654:172b-23: dang bral ba nyid kyis rang bzhin med pa nyid
T02D1654:172b-24: kyis na de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
T02D1654:172b-25: bha ga ni padma ste de'i dbus kyi gzhi la rnam par bzhugs te /
T02D1654:172b-26: rnam par rtog pa rnams bsal nas bzhugs te /
T02D1654:172b-27: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa nyid kyis so //
T02D1654:172b-28: de kye'i rdo rjer gsungs pa /
T02D1654:172b-29: rdo rje rtse mo'i bha ga bzang //
T02D1654:172b-30: bde ba can dung bzhugs te //
T02D1654:172b-31: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ae yig cha byad ngo bor ro //
T02D1654:172b-33: btsun mo'i bha ga bde chen du //
T02D1654:172b-34: khu ba'i ming gis rnam par gnas //
T02D1654:172b-35: de med par ni bde mi 'gyur //
T02D1654:172b-36: bde ba bor nas de mi 'gyur //
T02D1654:172b-39: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nga //
T02D1654:172b-40: mchog mtha' khyad dga' dang po can //
T02D1654:172b-42: 'dir khu ba'i ming gis zhes pa byang chub sems
T02D1654:172b-43: kyi rnam pa kho na'i sems de ltar gsal ba'i
T02D1654:172b-44: phyir ro // mchog mtha' khyad dga' dang po can //
T02D1654:173a-1: gi mtha' khyad par dga' ba ni gang gi dang po yin pa ste /
T02D1654:173a-2: mchog gi de ma thag tu khyad par dga' ba dang /
T02D1654:173a-3: de'i de ma thag tu lhan cig skyes pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1654:173a-4: lugs gzhan la ni khyad par dga' ba'i dang po ste /
T02D1654:173a-5: mchog dang khyad par dga' ba dag gi dbus su'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1654:173a-7: khyad dga' dang por mtshon par bya //
T02D1654:173a-8: de yang dga' ba gsum po spangs //
T02D1654:173a-10: 'dis ni khyad dga' yang 'di yin la dang por
T02D1654:173a-11: yang ngo zhes pas khyad dga'i dus kho nar nye
T02D1654:173a-12: bar 'chad pa'i lhan cig skyes pa dang po kho
T02D1654:173a-13: nar mtshon par bya'o zhes rtogs par byas te lhan
T02D1654:173a-14: cig skyes pa shar na ni rnam par rtog pa
T02D1654:173a-15: thams cad nub pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ga
T02D1654:173a-16: la mtshon // de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1654:173a-17: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba 'di //
T02D1654:173a-18: 'di kho na la gsal bar mtshon //
T02D1654:173a-19: zhes pa 'dis dga' ba gsum po mtshon pa dang bzhi pa mi mtshon par gsungs so //
T02D1654:173a-21: mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan //
T02D1654:173a-23: de'i phyir ji ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i rjes thogs su khyad dga' skye ste /
T02D1654:173a-24: mtshon par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1654:173a-25: khyad dga'i de ma thag pa'i dran pa kho nas
T02D1654:173a-26: mtshon pa nyid kyis na nyams su myong ba'i chos
T02D1654:173a-28: lhan cig skyes pa 'char ba'i gnas la ni log par rtogs pa med pa kho na'o //
T02D1654:173a-29: 'o na dang por yang ci'i phyir mtshon te /
T02D1654:173a-30: nyams su ma myong ba nyid kho na'i phyir ro zhe na /
T02D1654:173a-32: tho rangs kyi dus mtshams bzhin no //
T02D1654:173a-33: 'o na de lta na yang de'i ngo bo nyer bar mtshon pa kho na'o zhe na bden te /

T02D1654:180a-15: 'dis zhes pa aom buddha zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1654:180a-16: aom buddha zhes pa la sogs pa aa dhishtha ya
T02D1654:180a-17: hr'i: h'um zhes pa'i mthar thug pa sngags gcig ste
T02D1654:180a-19: sngags kyi zhes pa sngags so //
T02D1654:180a-20: 'di ni 'dir man ngag dang bcas pa'i bsdus pa'i don te /
T02D1654:180a-21: dur khrod du shing bab po la'i shun pa skam
T02D1654:180a-22: po dang rnam par snang mdzad skam po gcig tu
T02D1654:180a-23: dur khrod kyi mes sba la me de la snying
T02D1654:180a-24: gar shing bab po la gzhag pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag
T02D1654:180a-25: nas gzugs brnyan de'i snying gar tshangs pa'i rdo rje
T02D1654:180a-26: aom buddha zhes pa la sogs pa rkang pa lnga
T02D1654:180a-27: pa'i sngags kyis brgyad lhag pa'i brgyar sbyin sreg bya
T02D1654:180a-28: zhing gzugs brnyan de yang bsregs nas thal bar bya'o
T02D1654:180a-29: // de'i rjes su kham phor so ma btang ba
T02D1654:180a-30: dang padma'i snod dbus su padma 'dab ma bzhi pa
T02D1654:180a-31: bri zhing de'i lte bar rkang pa lnga pa'i sngags
T02D1654:180a-32: kyi tsi tra se na'i rkang pa'o //
T02D1654:180a-33: 'dab ma rnams la rkang pa gzhan rnams so //
T02D1654:180a-35: lha nyid sngags kyi gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1654:180a-36: dngos grub mtha' dag sgrub par mdzad //
T02D1654:180a-37: ces dpa' bo grub pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i phyir /
T02D1654:180a-38: sngags dang lha dag tha mi dad cing rang gi lha'i rang bzhin du bsgom mo //
T02D1654:180a-39: de nas thal ba de so ma btang ba'i kham phor du bzhag ste /
T02D1654:180a-40: nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu nyi ma so
T02D1654:180a-41: sor dus gsum du aom buddha zhes pa la sogs
T02D1654:180a-42: pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags
T02D1654:180b-0: par bya'o// @180b de'i rjes su thod par yang de
T02D1654:180b-1: ltar 'gyur ro zhes pas thal ba sgrub par 'gyur
T02D1654:180b-2: par bya'o// ro // des zhes pa ni de ltar bsgrubs pa'i rdo rje gtsug gnur [?] bas so //
T02D1654:180b-3: de kho na zhes pa dgra bo'o //
T02D1654:180b-5: de kho na zhes pa bsgrub pas so //
T02D1654:180b-6: mar khu bzang po ni skyes bu sbyangs pa'i mar khu ste des so //
T02D1654:180b-7: de rnams zhes pa gter rnams te /
T02D1654:180b-8: bsdigs so zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1654:180b-9: thams cad ni gter rnams so //
T02D1654:180b-10: sbyor ba gsum pa gsungs pa /
T02D1654:180b-11: thal ba des zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1654:180b-13: sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs shing mthe bos bskor nas kha sbub tu ltung bar byed do //
T02D1654:180b-14: sbyor ba bzhi pa gsungs te /
T02D1654:180b-15: des zhes pa bsgrubs pas so //
T02D1654:180b-16: thal ba de dang bdar zhing sbyangs pa'i zha nye'i phye ma dang rdo rje gtsug cha mnyam pa'o //
T02D1654:180b-17: cung zad ces pa zha nye'i phye las dman pa'i tshad do //
T02D1654:180b-18: 'di thams cad bsres par byas nas rdo rje mchu zhes pa phag nag po ste /
T02D1654:180b-19: de'i khu ba ni khrag go //
T02D1654:180b-20: rdo rje dbyug pa zhes klog pa la ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i khu ba ni mi'i chu'o //
T02D1654:180b-21: des te khrag gam chus bsgos nas /
T02D1654:180b-22: phyi nas srang gang gi tshad kyi tsher mas dbug tu rung ba'i zangs ma'i snod du bzhag ste /
T02D1654:180b-23: rdo rje mchu'i khu bas sam mi'i gci bas bkang nas zhag bdun du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1654:180b-24: de'i rjes su mkhris pa chen pos te mi'i mkhris
T02D1654:180b-25: pa dang lhan cig zag bdun du snod de kho
T02D1654:180b-27: de nas zhes snod nas so //
T02D1654:180b-29: khab len gyi lcags kyi snod srang gi tshad khab
T02D1654:180b-30: kyis dbug tu rung bar rdo rje mchu la sogs
T02D1654:180b-31: pas bsgom pa la sogs pa byas nas gzhag par
T02D1654:180b-33: de zhes pa de'i zangs kyi snod dam lcags kyi snod do //
T02D1654:180b-34: me la gzhag ste gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1654:180b-35: kha cig smra ba na bar chad med par 'bar
T02D1654:180b-36: ba'i sa gzhi la bzhag ste thob nas zhag bdun
T02D1654:180b-38: gzhan smra ba ni gzhag ste bskol bar bya'o zer ro //
T02D1654:180b-39: de nas zangs kyi snod de gser du 'gyur zhing lcags kyi snod ni dngul du 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:181a-0: gzhan rnams smra ba ni snod gang ci yang rung @181a * //
T02D1654:181a-1: bar dang por rdo rje mchu'i khu bas bsgos nas /
T02D1654:181a-2: de nas phyung nas zangs kyi snod dang lcags kyi
T02D1654:181a-3: snod du bsgo ba dang mnye ba dang gzhag pa
T02D1654:181a-4: rnams byas nas zangs kyi snod dam lcags kyi snod
T02D1654:181a-5: de dang lhan cig me'i dbus su ste gzhag go
T02D1654:181a-6: zhes pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1654:181a-7: 'on kyang bskol ba'i phyogs la gzha' tshe'i phye ma dang khab len gyi phye ma zad par bya'o //
T02D1654:181a-8: stong phrag ces pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1654:181a-9: sbyor ba lnga pa gsungs pa /
T02D1654:181a-10: de nyid kyis zhes pa grub pas so //
T02D1654:181a-11: nyi ma bzang po la tho rangs thal ba de
T02D1654:181a-12: gzhon nu ma'i mgor gzhag ste rdo rje gtsug phud
T02D1654:181a-13: kyis bkru'o // spos lnga ni sgron ma lnga'i bdug
T02D1654:181a-14: pas rkang pa lnga'i sngags klog cing bdug par bya'o
T02D1654:181a-15: kyis bkru'o // // sbyor ba drug pa gsungs pa /
T02D1654:181a-16: yungs kar dkar po gzhon nu ma'i thod par bskrun
T02D1654:181a-17: nas de las skyes pa'i 'bras bu'i sngags 'dis sngon
T02D1654:181a-18: du bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas pas lan bdun du mngon
T02D1654:181a-19: par bsngags pa'o // skar rtsis kyi cho ga 'dis
T02D1654:181a-20: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzhon
T02D1654:181a-21: par bsngags pa'o // nu ma'i'am / sgrub pa po
T02D1654:181a-22: brtan pa nyid las gzhan gyi'ang gdong pa la sngags
T02D1654:181a-24: de nas gzhon nu ma de dgod do //
T02D1654:181a-25: gcig ces pa gzhon nu ma'i kha nas byung ba'i
T02D1654:181a-26: ral gri rnams kyi ral gri gcig yud kyis bzung
T02D1654:181a-27: nas ral gri'i grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:181a-28: bzang po zhes pa bzang mo ste rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
T02D1654:181a-29: sbyor ba bdun pa gsungs pa /
T02D1654:181a-30: de'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:181a-31: thal ba'i ri lu rim gyis gser dang dngul dang
T02D1654:181a-32: zangs rnams kyis dkris nas de ma thag tu brjod
T02D1654:181a-33: pa'i sngags 'bum bzlas pa byas pas lan bdun du
T02D1654:181a-34: mngon par bsngags pas dro ba dang du ba dang
T02D1654:181a-35: 'bar ba'i rjes thogs su khar gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1654:181a-36: 'dir gser gyi tshad ni ra ti phyed dang bcas pa bdun lhag pa'i drug nam gsum mo //
T02D1654:181a-37: dngul gyi ni phyed dang bcas pa'i ra ti gnyis lhag pa'i drung nam bzhi'o //
T02D1654:181a-38: zangs ma'i ni ra ti lnga lhag pa'i drug nam lnga'o //
T02D1654:181a-40: phyed dang brgyad dang m'a sa gsum //
T02D1654:181b-0: phyed dang gsum dang de @181b bzhin bzhi //
T02D1654:181b-1: ra ti lnga dang m'a sa gsum //
T02D1654:181b-2: ri lu bcing la yang dag nges //
T02D1654:181b-4: 'jig rten gsum bsgrub pa'i sngags zhes pa grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags so //
T02D1654:181b-5: las kyis rjes su 'brang bas bcom ldan 'das dang
T02D1654:181b-6: bcom ldan 'das ma dag gi sku mdog gi dbye
T02D1654:181b-7: ba brgyad par 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes pa mkhas
T02D1654:181b-8: pa aa bha ya a'a ka ra guptas mdzad pa'i
T02D1654:181b-9: 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u gnyis pa'o
T02D1654:181b-11: / // / sngags bshad nas sngags kyi rang bzhin gyi sku
T02D1654:181b-12: dang rdzogs pa'i ngo bo yang bshad pa'i ched du
T02D1654:181b-13: gsungs pa / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:181b-14: lha'i le'u zhes pa sngags las skyes pa rnams kyi dang /
T02D1654:181b-15: rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i lha rnams kyi le'u'o //
T02D1654:181b-16: ram yig ces pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1654:181b-17: 'khor lo bsgom pa ni gsal bar phyogs gcig tu
T02D1654:181b-19: nang gi ni rdo rje sa gzhi zhes pa la
T02D1654:181b-20: sogs pa la rdo rje sa gzhi ni lte ba
T02D1654:181b-22: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la ni ae yig bdag nyid
T02D1654:181b-23: chen po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no
T02D1654:181b-24: // ae yig yongs su gyur ba'i gru gsum ni chos 'byung sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste /
T02D1654:181b-25: khams gsum bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02D1654:181b-26: gru gsum de'i dbus su ae yig gam lam yig sa bon te /
T02D1654:181b-27: de yongs su gyur ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1654:181b-28: snying gar bam yig gam aom yig ni chos te
T02D1654:181b-29: sems yin zhing de'i bdag nyid ni de las byung
T02D1654:181b-30: ba ste / 'khor lo chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1654:181b-31: rtsa rnams kun gyi ngo bo can //
T02D1654:181b-32: zhes pa rtsa brgyad kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1654:181b-33: 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa rnams kyang bde ba chen po'i
T02D1654:181b-34: sems las tha mi dad pa'i phyir de'i rang bzhin
T02D1654:181b-36: rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par gnas //
T02D1654:181b-37: zhes pa rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams te /
T02D1654:181b-38: khyad par du bde ba chen po'i gnas nas 'dzag
T02D1654:181b-39: pa byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa rnams gang du
T02D1654:181b-40: gnas pa'o // bzang ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo de'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1654:181b-41: rtsa thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtsa sum cu rtsa
T02D1654:181b-42: gnyis po 'di rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems 'bab
T02D1654:182a-1: las dang khyad par gyi las dang ming yang rgyud gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang bas bshad par bya'o //
T02D1654:182a-2: de la aa ba dh'u t'i ni byang chub kyi sems kho na 'bebs so //
T02D1654:182a-3: rkyang ma lte ba'i rtsa bar 'phyang bzhin pa ni
T02D1654:182a-4: zos pa dang 'thungs pa rnams lto ba'i mes smin
T02D1654:182a-5: pa rnams las zhu ba 'bebs so //
T02D1654:182a-6: de las zhu ba 'di rtsa gzhan dang gzhan du rgyu bas lus mngon par khyab par byed do //
T02D1654:182a-7: ra sa n'a ni zhu ba las khrag 'bab po //
T02D1654:182a-8: de'i phyir de yang de lta kho nar lus la khyab par byed do //
T02D1654:182a-9: kun gyi yang bsdu ba 'di yin te /
T02D1654:182a-10: mi phyed so dang sen mo 'bab //
T02D1654:182a-11: phra mo skra dang ba sbu 'byin //
T02D1654:182a-12: rtsen mo pags pa dri ma 'bab //
T02D1654:182a-13: g-yon pa ma ni sha 'bab cing //
T02D1654:182a-15: rus sbal skyes pa rus sbal 'dod //
T02D1654:182a-19: mjug ma mkhris pa 'bab par bshad //
T02D1654:182a-20: ma mo ma ni glo ba 'bab //
T02D1654:182a-21: mtshan mo ma ni rgyu ma 'bab //
T02D1654:182a-22: bsil ba ma ni lta zur dag / drod ma lto ba 'bab par 'gyur //
T02D1654:182a-24: aa ba dh'u t'i zla ba 'bab //
T02D1654:182a-25: ro ma khrag 'bab byed par bshad //
T02D1654:182a-26: bshang ba la ni gzhol mar 'dod //
T02D1654:182a-27: dga' gdong ma ni skra mtshams la'o //
T02D1654:182a-28: spyi ma rnag ni 'bab par byed /
T02D1654:182a-29: kan rgyu sbyin ma ru bshad //
T02D1654:182a-30: rdul 'bab ma ni bral ba ma //
T02D1654:182a-31: tshil la dga' ba ma zhes brjod //
T02D1654:182a-32: grub ma mya ngan mchi ma 'bab //
T02D1654:182a-34: yid bzangs ma ni snabs 'bab pa //
T02D1654:182a-35: gsum skor ma ni gzugs la 'dod //
T02D1654:182a-36: 'dod pa ma ni sgra la bshad //
T02D1654:182a-39: reg la rnal 'byor mar shes bya //
T02D1654:182a-42: 'dir la la n'a dang ro ma dang kun 'dar ma ni sna tshogs sde ma'o //
T02D1654:182a-43: de las gzhan gnyis gnyis ni rim pa bzhin phring bzangs ma dang thod pa can ma dang /
T02D1654:182b-0: de las gzhan rnams ni dge @182b ba'i ska rags
T02D1654:182b-1: ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma nyi shu'i ngo
T02D1654:182b-3: bdud 'dral ma ni aa ba dh'u t'i dang 'dres pa kho na ste /
T02D1654:182b-4: lce'i rtse mo ji srid par lte ba nas langs pa dus kyi rtsa ste /
T02D1654:182b-5: 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos rnal 'byor ma rnams 'bab pa'o //
T02D1654:182b-6: da ni rnal 'byor ma bsdus pas rab tu 'jug ste /
T02D1654:182b-7: de ni ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1654:182b-8: 'o na brtag pa gnyis par byang chub kyi sems
T02D1654:182b-9: sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab pa rnams so zhes gsungs
T02D1654:182b-11: dus kyi rtsa ni 'gog pa nyid du 'bab par byed pa'i phyir skyon med do //
T02D1654:182b-12: rnal 'byor ma ngo bor rtsa ston pa'i skabs su
T02D1654:182b-13: ni de ston pa yongs su spangs pa'i don to
T02D1654:182b-14: // de'i dbang las 'jig rten 'di bde ba chen
T02D1654:182b-15: po'i rang bzhin du skyes kyang de'i dkyil 'khor mi
T02D1654:182b-16: // mthong ngo // de'i bde ba yang ngo //
T02D1654:182b-17: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1654:182b-18: 'bad pas kun gyi lhag ma spang //
T02D1654:182b-20: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni kun gyi thabs so //
T02D1654:182b-21: 'di yang don dam par sa bon las skya ba
T02D1654:182b-22: med pa kho nar stong pa nyid dang snying rje
T02D1654:182b-23: dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo
T02D1654:182b-25: bcu drug cha yis brgyan gyur pa ;
T02D1654:182b-28: rtsa bcu drug dang ldan pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1654:182b-29: sprul pa ni sprul pa'i padma de gang du drug
T02D1654:182b-30: cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ma rnams te rtsa rnams yin
T02D1654:182b-31: pa de'o // de ltar zhes pa 'khor lo bzhi rnams su rtsa brgya nyi shu ste ;
T02D1654:182b-32: rtsa rnams nyi shu lhag pa'i brgyar 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:182b-33: de ltar bsam par bya zhes pa de ltar rdzogs
T02D1654:182b-34: pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya ste bsgom par bya
T02D1654:182b-36: de la rkyang mdang ro mar srog gi rlung thun
T02D1654:182b-37: phyed phyed du bdag po nyid kyi phyir nyin mtshan
T02D1654:182b-38: du 'pho ba bcu drug rnams mgrin par ro //
T02D1654:182b-39: de kho na la dkyil 'khor bzhi'i dbye bas dbyu
T02D1654:182b-40: gu bzhi'i bdag po nyid las sprul ba'i 'khor lor
T02D1654:182b-41: dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams su 'gyur ro
T02D1654:182b-42: // bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par sbyor ba la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams su dang /
T02D1654:183a-1: pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis kyang ji skad du gsungs pa /
T02D1654:183a-2: me nyid dang ni rlung dang ni //
T02D1654:183a-3: dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu'i //
T02D1654:183a-4: dkyil 'khor du ni de rgyu ba //
T02D1654:183a-7: de kho na la so sor shes rab dang /
T02D1654:183a-8: thabs kyi ngo bo'i dkyil 'khor gnyis longs spyod pa
T02D1654:183a-9: las rtsa ba'i 'khor lor yang dag par rgyu ba'i
T02D1654:183a-10: phyir bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor rtsa sum cu
T02D1654:183a-12: nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i rnam par dbye bas shes
T02D1654:183a-13: rab dang thabs kyis dbye ba las thun brgyad rnams
T02D1654:183a-15: rgyud gzhan rnams su nyin zhag dbyu gu drug cu'i
T02D1654:183a-16: bdag nyid du gang gsungs pa de ni dbugs drug
T02D1654:183a-17: cu lhag pa'i sum brgya rnams dbyu gur rnam par
T02D1654:183a-18: gzhag pas so // 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bzhir rnam
T02D1654:183a-19: par gzhag pas dbugs phyed dang bcas pa sum cu
T02D1654:183a-20: rtsa bdun lhag pa'i sum brgya rnams dbyu gur rnam
T02D1654:183a-21: gzhag pas so // par gzhag pa'o // gnyis ka
T02D1654:183a-22: la yang nyin mtshan la dbugs drug brgya lhag pa'i
T02D1654:183a-23: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1654:183a-25: de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa la ltos pas bzlas pa yang rdzogs par gsal bar byas so //
T02D1654:183a-27: rnal 'byor dbang po nyin mtshan gyis //
T02D1654:183a-28: nyi khri dang ni stong phrag dang //
T02D1654:183a-29: de bzhin brgya phrag drug tu ni //
T02D1654:183a-30: bzlas pa yis ni grangs byed do //
T02D1654:183a-32: rig pa bzlas pas sems brtan pa na bde ba
T02D1654:183a-33: chen po'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la mngon
T02D1654:183a-35: shes rab can zhes pa shes rab chen po can
T02D1654:183a-36: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa la mkhas
T02D1654:183a-37: pa'o // rdo rje sku la ni stong pa nyid
T02D1654:183a-38: dang ro gcig pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D1654:183a-39: pa'o // gyi sku la'o // de nyid kyi phyir
T02D1654:183a-40: rang dang gzhan dag phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub
T02D1654:183a-41: tu rung ba nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid chen po'o
T02D1654:183a-42: pa'o // gyi sku la'o // // der zhes pa chos kyi 'khor lor ro //
T02D1654:183a-43: bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni bam las skyes pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1654:183a-44: rtsa rnams kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1654:183b-1: zhes pa rtsa'i dkyil 'khor gzhan ni snying ga'i rtsa brgyad po rnams kho na 'pho ba ste /
T02D1654:183b-2: de'i phyir rtsa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad chu'i dkyil 'khor la 'byor bar byed do //
T02D1654:183b-3: slar yang zhes pa la sogs pa la sprul pa'i
T02D1654:183b-4: 'khor lo'i 'og tu ma yig dmar po las skyes
T02D1654:183b-5: pa'am / ram las skyes pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru
T02D1654:183b-6: gsum pa 'bar ba sprul ba'i rtsa'i 'khor lo la
T02D1654:183b-7: pa'am / 'byar bzhin pa'o // me las 'og tu y'a yig las skyes pa'am /
T02D1654:183b-8: yam yig las skyes pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1654:183b-9: rtsa rnams thams cad g-yo byed gzugs //
T02D1654:183b-10: zhes rlung gi dkyil 'khor des me 'bar bar byed
T02D1654:183b-11: cing rtsa thams cad la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1654:183b-13: thim bzhin pa ni 'khor lo rig / ces pa
T02D1654:183b-14: 'khor lo la thim bzhin pa ni rig pa ste
T02D1654:183b-15: rig par byed pa des g-yos pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1654:183b-16: sems rlung gi 'khor lor thim pa de'i tshe lhan
T02D1654:183b-17: cig skyes pa'i bde ba rig par 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:183b-18: de rnams thams cad thim pa yis //
T02D1654:183b-19: rnal 'byor pa de dbus su gnas //
T02D1654:183b-20: zhes pa der te lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba rig pa la /
T02D1654:183b-21: thams cad de phung po la sogs pa rnams thig
T02D1654:183b-22: le bzhin pa rnams dang rnal 'byor ba ni sems
T02D1654:183b-23: te de yang der de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas so
T02D1654:183b-24: // zla ba zhes pa byang chub kyi sems te
T02D1654:183b-25: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor spyi gtsug ji srid
T02D1654:183b-26: // par ro // nyi ma ni rdul te sprul ba'i 'og tu'o //
T02D1654:183b-27: h'um a'a: zhes pa la kha cig tu h'um aam zhes klog ste /
T02D1654:183b-28: h'um yig sngon po ni chos kyi 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1654:183b-29: a'a: yig gam aam yig dmar po ni sprul ba'i 'khor lo ro //
T02D1654:183b-30: longs spyod kyi 'khor lor aom yig dmar po ste rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1654:183b-31: ka yig ha yig brgyan gyur pa ;
T02D1654:183b-32: ; zhes pa ka yig kyang 'di yin la ha yig kyang yin zhing brgyan pa'ang ngo //
T02D1654:183b-33: kam bde ba chen po ste de'i rang bzhin ni
T02D1654:183b-34: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor ha yig dpral bar
T02D1654:183b-35: stong pa gzhom du med pa zla ba phyed pa
T02D1654:183b-36: dang thig les brgyan pa dkar po bsam par bya'o
T02D1654:184a-2: zhes pa bde ba chen po gzhom du med pa
T02D1654:184a-3: la 'dres par gyur pa ste dbyer med pa zhes
T02D1654:184a-4: pa'i bar ro // ha h'um dbyer med pa zhes
T02D1654:184a-5: pa gzhom du med pa'i rang bzhin ji lta ba
T02D1654:184a-6: de lta bu ni h'um yig ste /
T02D1654:184a-7: gnyi ga yang gnyis ka'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1654:184a-9: de yi bde ba 'dod par bshad //
T02D1654:184a-11: kam shes rab dang ha thabs te de dag dbyer
T02D1654:184a-12: med pa de ltar bde ba'i bdag nyid kyi ha
T02D1654:184a-13: yig ni shes rab a'um yig dang ldan pa las
T02D1654:184a-14: ha h'um zhes pa'i yig ge gnyis 'dres pa ni
T02D1654:184a-15: h'um yig sems thabs sa zhes pa shes rab dang
T02D1654:184a-17: h'um yig gi ni 'od zer rnams //
T02D1654:184a-18: zhes pa rlung gis me gtum mo'i 'od zer bskul
T02D1654:184a-19: ba bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor son pa ste
T02D1654:184a-20: / der ri bong can bskul zhing ri bong can
T02D1654:184a-21: gyis rnam par rtog pa'i gdung bzhi ba las kha
T02D1654:184a-22: ba lta bu'i ka yig bde ba chen po dang
T02D1654:184a-23: nyi ma rdul dang ha dang aom dag lhan cig
T02D1654:184a-24: zhu bar gyur nas h'um yig la ngal bso'o //
T02D1654:184a-25: de nas h'um yig kyang zhu bar gyur nas sprul pa'i sa bon la ngal ba so'o //
T02D1654:184a-26: de dang nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis
T02D1654:184a-27: kyang 'dres par gyur nas nyi ma zhes pa rdul
T02D1654:184a-28: gyi dkyil 'khor kho na lhag pa'i thig le'i gzugs
T02D1654:184a-30: khu ba ni lhag ma min pa'o //
T02D1654:184a-31: yang ni h'um yig 'od zer rnams //
T02D1654:184a-32: zhes pa h'um yig zhu ba'i thag le'i 'od zer
T02D1654:184a-33: gyi ri mo rtsa'i 'khor lo thams cad la reg
T02D1654:184a-34: pa'o // sa bon zhes pa bde ba chen po bskyed pa thig le'i gzugs so //
T02D1654:184a-35: de ltar thig le'u rnal 'byor gsungs so //
T02D1654:184a-36: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa la ni sa bon
T02D1654:184a-37: la sogs pa bskyed pa med par rdul gyi ngo
T02D1654:184a-38: bo'i gtum mo nges par 'byung ba yang shin tu
T02D1654:184a-39: 'bar ro // des mchog tu sbar ba'i ri bong can yang shin tu ches 'dzeg go //
T02D1654:184a-40: des brtas par byas pa'i gtum mo'o //
T02D1654:184a-42: ri bong can des mchog tu gdungs pa yang ches 'dzeg go //
T02D1654:184a-43: de ltar nang gi zla ba dang nyi ma mnyam
T02D1654:184a-44: par 'du ba bar ma chad pa bde ba chen
T02D1654:184b-0: po'i rang @184b bzhin phung po dang khams la sogs
T02D1654:184b-1: pa sgro btags pa zil gyis gnon pa rab tu
T02D1654:184b-2: skye'o // gang rnams de ltar mi mos pa de
T02D1654:184b-3: rnams ni ji skad bshad pa'i bzlas pas srog sdom
T02D1654:184b-4: pa la dbang nyid thob pas thur sel gyi rlung
T02D1654:184b-5: bsdus lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya chen po
T02D1654:184b-6: skye'o // dmigs te / rlung bkag pas gtum mo 'bar du 'jug go //
T02D1654:184b-7: de nas de lta kho nar bde ba chen po gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:184b-8: de ltar mi nus pas ni de ltar kho nar
T02D1654:184b-9: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du rlung bkag par mos nas
T02D1654:184b-10: gnas pas dbugs 'byung ba ni ri mo drang po
T02D1654:184b-11: gtum mo'i ngo bos bcom ldan 'das ma 'bar ba
T02D1654:184b-12: mos te / bde ba chen po'i gnas rjes su
T02D1654:184b-13: thob pa las dbugs 'jug pa na ham yig zla
T02D1654:184b-14: ba 'dzag pa'i thig le'u gzugs kyis de lta dmigs
T02D1654:184b-15: bzhin pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin lte ba'i
T02D1654:184b-16: dkyil 'khor du 'ongs nas dmigs pa med par 'gyur
T02D1654:184b-17: mos te / ro // de ltar ji srid du srog 'gog pa'i bar du gnas par bya ste /
T02D1654:184b-18: de kho nar dbugs 'byung ba dang /
T02D1654:184b-19: 'jug pa dag yang dang yang du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1654:184b-21: 'jug pa brtag par mi nus pa de lhag par mos pa tsam kho na sgrub par byed do //
T02D1654:184b-22: bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos ni de sngon
T02D1654:184b-23: ma can kho nar 'di mtha' dag stobs ji lta
T02D1654:184b-25: rgyas pa la dga' bas ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor
T02D1654:184b-26: lo mtha' dag gi ngo bo phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1654:184b-27: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma sna tshogs sde ma
T02D1654:184b-28: gtum mo'i ngo bo 'bar bzhin pas phyogs bcur 'phros
T02D1654:184b-29: pas 'dod chags chen po'i me'i 'od kyis bskul ba'i
T02D1654:184b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags chen po rjes su
T02D1654:184b-31: chags pa rnam pa thams cad bde ba chen po'i
T02D1654:184b-32: 'khor lor zhugs par bltas nas de kho na bzhin
T02D1654:184b-33: du thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1654:184b-34: de ltar 'di la sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyang
T02D1654:184b-35: 'byung ngo zhes pa gtum mo'i gdams pa'i dbye ba'o
T02D1654:184b-36: // 'di thams cad kyang bla ma dam pas gdams par byas pa bsnyad pa'o //
T02D1654:184b-37: de kho nas zhes pa mi'i rgyus pa rlon pas zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1654:185a-0: de ltar pha rol phyin ma zhes pa shes @185a * //
T02D1654:185a-1: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1654:185a-2: bcom ldan 'das ni snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1654:185a-3: de yi lus skyes 'od zer rnams //
T02D1654:185a-4: zhes pa bcom ldan 'das de'i sku las skyes pa'i gtum mo'i 'od zer rnams so //
T02D1654:185a-5: 'dzag pa des zhes pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i sa
T02D1654:185a-6: bon bkru ba'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa
T02D1654:185a-7: brgyad po'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma rnams phyi rol
T02D1654:185a-8: tu spros nas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1654:185a-9: dri bzang lnga zhes pa bdud rtsi lnga rnams sa //
T02D1654:185a-10: me tog ni bud med kyi rdul lo //
T02D1654:185a-11: bdug spos ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i chags pas 'bar ba'i gtum mo'i mar me'i'o //
T02D1654:185a-12: dpa' bo rdzogs pa zhes pa dpa' bo grub par mthong nas sngar bzhin 'dzag go //
T02D1654:185a-13: aa mra'i lo ma ni sa ha k'a ra'i 'dab ma'o //
T02D1654:185a-14: gsol ba gdab ces pa don du gnyer bar bya'o //
T02D1654:185a-15: dbang bskur ba yis zhes pa la /
T02D1654:185a-16: dbang bskur ni dri ma med par byed pa'o //
T02D1654:185a-17: mkhas pa ni rig pa dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1654:185a-18: sgrol ba'i thabs rig pa rnams so //
T02D1654:185a-19: bu tshe med ces pa la sogs pa la ji
T02D1654:185a-20: ltar bu shi ba'i khyim du bus stong pa ste
T02D1654:185a-21: de ltar dbang bskur dang bral ba'i skyes bu la
T02D1654:185a-22: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang bral ba'o //
T02D1654:185a-23: ji ltar thams cad sbyar ba na yang /
T02D1654:185a-24: pi wang rgyud med brdung mi rung //
T02D1654:185a-25: de las sgra 'grub ma yin no //
T02D1654:185a-26: ji srid sangs rgyas kyis mi spong ste /
T02D1654:185a-27: dmyal ba mi 'dor gyi bar du'o //
T02D1654:185a-28: 'dis ni dbang bskur thams cad gdon mi za bar gzung par gsungs so //
T02D1654:185a-29: he ru kar gyur pa na zhes pa //
T02D1654:185a-30: he ru ka'i gzugs su bsgom pa rdzogs pas /
T02D1654:185a-31: dgos pa ci ste dbang bskur med na sangs rgyas nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1654:185a-32: bsod nams tsam du ni 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1654:185a-34: phyi dang gsang ba zhes nye bar mtshon pa las
T02D1654:185a-35: shes rab dang bzhi ba'i dbang bskur dag kyang shes
T02D1654:185a-36: par bya'o // dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen
T02D1654:185a-37: po'i 'grel pa 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel du
T02D1654:185a-39: mkha' lding sbyor ba bshad pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1654:185b-0: de @185b nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:185b-1: bdag cag gi ni bdag cag rnams so //
T02D1654:185b-2: 'od zer gyis ni le'u dang por spros pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyis so //
T02D1654:185b-3: snying ga'i 'od zer rnams zhes pa sna tshogs sde
T02D1654:185b-4: ma'i snying ga'i 'od zer rnams kyis klu rnams gtad
T02D1654:185b-5: par byas nas 'ongs te sna tshogs sde ma'i snying
T02D1654:185b-7: bka' bsgos pa zhes pa bdag cag rnams so //
T02D1654:185b-8: lha mo zhes pa kye lha mo'o //
T02D1654:185b-9: gsungs pa zhes pa sna tshogs sde mas so //
T02D1654:185b-10: klu rnams la byin gyis brlabs nas de'i khas dug
T02D1654:185b-11: gi de kho na nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i ched
T02D1654:185b-12: du dri ma lnga rnams te //
T02D1654:185b-13: mu stegs la sogs mkha' lding sbyor //
T02D1654:185b-15: khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams kyi dang /
T02D1654:185b-16: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mkha' lding sbyor
T02D1654:185b-17: ba sngags dang sman dang ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad
T02D1654:185b-18: par ro // ji lta bur 'dod de ye shes
T02D1654:185b-19: kyang de yin la yang dag par 'byung ngo zhes
T02D1654:185b-21: ye shes 'byung ba ji lta bu ma ning nyid
T02D1654:185b-22: ni khyad par lhur byed pa'am gtsug lag nyid kyi
T02D1654:185b-23: phyir ro // dug gi zhes pa dug go //
T02D1654:185b-24: ji ltar zhes pa rab tu dbye ba dris pa'o //
T02D1654:185b-25: zhus pa zhes pa klu rnams kyis so //
T02D1654:185b-26: khyab 'jug ces pa la sogs pa mu stegs pa'i phyogs la dri ba lnga ba len 'don pa'o //
T02D1654:185b-27: khyab 'jug dang dbyang phyug la sogs pa blo phyin
T02D1654:185b-28: ci log pa dngos po'i de kho na nyid mngon
T02D1654:185b-29: par mi shes pa rnams te /
T02D1654:185b-30: de rnams kyi lugs la mche bas gzung ba'i dug dang mche ba yang don dam pa yod do //
T02D1654:185b-31: de'i phyir de kho na nyid mi shes pa las dug gi skyon rnams kyis gnod 'gyur te /
T02D1654:185b-32: 'chi bar 'gyur zhing mkha' lding sbyor bas kyang 'tsho bar nus pa ma yin te /
T02D1654:185b-33: de ltar dus su gzung bar smra zhes pa /
T02D1654:185b-34: mda' dang phyogs dus me dang rta //
T02D1654:185b-35: zung dang zla ba sogs kyi nyin //
T02D1654:185b-36: drug dang rig byed lag bdun mda' //
T02D1654:185b-37: yon tan phun tshogs ri mtshan mo //
T02D1654:185b-38: zhes pa la sogs pa'i lan rnams la rim pa ji lta bar thun phyed rnams ni dus te /
T02D1654:185b-39: de la bzung ba ni bcos su mi rung bar smra'o zhes pa dri ba gsum pa'i lan no //
T02D1654:186a-2: sprul gyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1654:186a-3: dus su zin pa nyid med na 'phrog go zhes pa 'phrog byed do //
T02D1654:186a-4: khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug la sogs pas byas pa'i
T02D1654:186a-5: sbrul gyi dug zil gyis gnon pa'i thabs yod do
T02D1654:186a-6: // de ltar gyur na bzung ba la sbrul gyi dag med do //
T02D1654:186a-7: dus su zin pa nyid la mkha' lding gi sbyor ba med na /
T02D1654:186a-8: sbrul gyis zhes pa la sogs pa nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T02D1654:186a-9: rdzu 'phrul che ba ni mkha' lding sbyor ba byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1654:186a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyogs la dri ba gnyis pa'i len ldon te /
T02D1654:186a-11: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:186a-12: dor bya dang blang bya ston pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
T02D1654:186a-13: khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug la sogs pa yang /
T02D1654:186a-14: de la gus pa rnams kyi ston par brjod do zhes pas gsungs pa //
T02D1654:186a-15: stong nyid nges gsungs pa zhes te /
T02D1654:186a-16: thabs byung ste rgyu lkog gyur pas //
T02D1654:186a-17: de 'chad pa ni dka' ba yin //
T02D1654:186a-18: zhes pa'i rig pa las dngos po mtha' dag gi
T02D1654:186a-19: de kho na nyid khong du chud pa brtse ba'i
T02D1654:186a-20: gzhan dbang nyid las gdul bya rnams la stong pa
T02D1654:186a-21: nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid gsungs
T02D1654:186a-22: pa'o // nges pa ni zin pa nyid de bya ba'i khyad par ro //
T02D1654:186a-23: bde byed la sogs pa rnams ni rang nyid kyis
T02D1654:186a-24: de kho na nyid ma nges shing gzhan rnams la
T02D1654:186a-25: yang nges par mi smra'o zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
T02D1654:186a-26: des bstan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D1654:186a-27: kho na dug byed pa bla na med pa'o zhes
T02D1654:186a-28: dri ba dang po lan 'debs par byed pa /
T02D1654:186a-29: stong pa la zhes pa gcig dang du ma'i rang
T02D1654:186a-30: bzhin dang bral ba'i rang bzhin med pa rnams la'o
T02D1654:186a-32: stong nyid de nyid khyod dgongs pa //
T02D1654:186a-33: zhes pa chos rnams thams cad la ste phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams la'o //
T02D1654:186a-34: sprul dang gzung ba dang dug kyang ji ltar te med pa kho na'o //
T02D1654:186a-35: 'di ltar stong pa nyid las dug gi de kho
T02D1654:186a-36: na nyid nges pas dug gdon mi za bar 'jig
T02D1654:186a-37: par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1654:186a-38: de nyid kyi dri ba gsum pa'i lan ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1654:186a-39: thams cad du ci ni spong ba la'o //
T02D1654:186a-40: dri ba lnga pa la lan zin pas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1654:186b-0: stong pa nyid ni ma @186b nges pa las ni 'chi ste /
T02D1654:186b-1: de'i phyir de rnams stong pa nyid smra bas bstan pas bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa gsungs so //
T02D1654:186b-2: da ni gang rnams la nang gi dug med pa
T02D1654:186b-3: de rnams la sbrul la sogs pa'i dug kyang ngo
T02D1654:186b-4: zhes bshad pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1654:186b-5: 'dod chags zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:186b-6: 'dod chags ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po la chags pa'o //
T02D1654:186b-7: gti mug ni ma rig pa ste dngos po dang dngos med la sogs par zhen pa'o //
T02D1654:186b-8: grags chen ma zhes pa sna tshogs sde ma bod pa'o //
T02D1654:186b-9: tha mal pa'i yul zhes pa la tha ma la ni 'dir ma rig pa ste /
T02D1654:186b-10: des sgro btags pa rnams ni tha mal pa'o //
T02D1654:186b-11: rang bzhin yul ni dri ma med //
T02D1654:186b-13: rang bzhin ni 'dir stong pa nyid de des gzugs
T02D1654:186b-14: la sogs pa'i yul lnga sems kyis rnam par bsgrubs
T02D1654:186b-15: pa lnga rnams dri ma 'dod chags pa bag chags
T02D1654:186b-16: dang bcas pa rnams legs par rtsad nas bton cing
T02D1654:186b-17: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang rnams la yod
T02D1654:186b-18: pa de rnams ni de skad do //
T02D1654:186b-19: mang po nyid la gcig gi tshig ni gtsug lag nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1654:186b-20: 'di rnams kyi dri ma med pa nyid kyang sems dri ma med pa nyid las so //
T02D1654:186b-21: sems kyang rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pas ste /
T02D1654:186b-22: de tshad ma rnam 'grel du gsungs pa /
T02D1654:186b-23: sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02D1654:186b-24: dri ma rnams ni glo bur ba //
T02D1654:186b-26: dkyus ma la sbyor ba ni dri ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:186b-28: 'dod chags la sogs pa kho na nang gi dug
T02D1654:186b-29: ste bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi srog
T02D1654:186b-31: de'i sems kyi dbang las yul gyi rang gi ngo bo yang dug go //
T02D1654:186b-32: gang gi tshe sems stong pa nyid dang snying rje
T02D1654:186b-33: dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa nyid
T02D1654:186b-34: las dug med par nges pa de'i tshe yul gyi
T02D1654:186b-35: rang gi ngo bo yang dri ma dang bral ba
T02D1654:186b-36: ste ji ltar te dug ma yin pa kho na'o
T02D1654:186b-37: // 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis brten pa'i dug la
T02D1654:186b-38: sogs pa za ba la sogs pa na de kho
T02D1654:186b-39: na nyid la mos pa las mi gnod do zhes

T02D1654:190a-21: phung shes rab kyi padmar gnas pa la snying ga'i
T02D1654:190a-22: sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa aa
T02D1654:190a-23: ba dh'u t'i nas zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1654:190a-24: zhu ba rnams kyis dbang bskur ba he ru ka'i
T02D1654:190a-25: gzugs can dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor bzhag nas /
T02D1654:190a-26: sems can don la gcig tu brtson //
T02D1654:190a-27: bcom ldan bla ma ston pa kye //
T02D1654:190a-28: dug zhi'i thabs ni bzang po 'tshal //
T02D1654:190a-29: sh'a li ka byed sbyor ba skyes //
T02D1654:190a-30: sems can don ni bzang po bgyid //
T02D1654:190a-31: dus su bzung ba zlog byed pa //
T02D1654:190a-32: de ni ston chen bdag la gsungs //
T02D1654:190a-33: sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ldan pas //
T02D1654:190a-34: zhes pa 'dis 'jug pa zhur bcug nas /
T02D1654:190a-35: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D1654:190a-36: sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags //
T02D1654:190a-37: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D1654:190a-38: sangs rgyas byang chub yid la gzung //
T02D1654:190a-39: zhes lan gsum brjod du gzhug ste /
T02D1654:190a-40: snying po'i sngags kyis bsrungs la /
T02D1654:190a-41: de'i snying gar rdo rje nag po'i lte ba la h'um /
T02D1654:190a-42: mgrin par padma dmar po la a'a:/
T02D1654:190a-43: mgo bo la 'khor lo dkar po aom zhes pa'i yi ge rnams nag po dang /
T02D1654:190b-0: @190b dkar po rnams bsam par bya'o //
T02D1654:190b-1: de nas langs te dri'i chu dang /
T02D1654:190b-2: rdo rje dang ldan pa'i lag pa g-yas pas h'um a'a: aom zhes brjod cing /
T02D1654:190b-5: mgo bo rnams la reg nas mgo bo la me tog dang /
T02D1654:190b-9: de'i rjes su aa shvattha la sogs pa'i so shing rtse mo la gas pa /
T02D1654:190b-10: 'khyog po la sogs pa ma yin pa /
T02D1654:190b-11: sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad tsam pa /
T02D1654:190b-12: me tog gi phreng ba brtse mo la dkris pa //
T02D1654:190b-13: dri zhim po'i chus bkrus pa /
T02D1654:190b-14: so shing gi sngags kyis lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa shar du phyogs pas sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1654:190b-15: slob mas kyang shar ram byang du phyogs pas rtse
T02D1654:190b-16: mo 'chos nas gyen du ltos pa med par gzhi
T02D1654:190b-17: ba lang gi ko ba tsam byugs par dor ro
T02D1654:190b-18: // de nas kha bshal ba'i don du dri'i chu khyor ba gsum gyi btung ba /
T02D1654:190b-19: aom hr'i: bi shuddha sarba dharm'a sarba p'a pa ni
T02D1654:190b-20: tsa aa sye bi sho dha ya sarba bi ka
T02D1654:190b-21: wan aa pa na ya h'um zhes pa'i sngags 'dis
T02D1654:190b-23: de'i rjes su slob dpon gyis rang gi lag pa g-yon pa dang /
T02D1654:190b-24: mgrin pa dris byugs shing me tog gis dkris par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bltas la /
T02D1654:190b-25: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams
T02D1654:190b-26: spyan drangs pa 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur
T02D1654:190b-27: nas zla ba gnyis la thim par bsam par bya'o
T02D1654:190b-28: // de nas lag pa de slob ma'i mgor bzhag
T02D1654:190b-29: nas lhag gnas kyi sngags lan bdun du bzlas so
T02D1654:190b-30: // // de nas mgrin par gnas pa dang /
T02D1654:190b-31: lag par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams zla ba dang bcas pa slob ma'i lus la zhugs nas /
T02D1654:190b-32: byin rlabs mdzad par bsams te /
T02D1654:190b-34: de nas de la snying po'i sngags bzlas pa'i ku sha rnams bting ste /
T02D1654:190b-35: sngas dang stan gyi don du sbyin no //
T02D1654:190b-36: slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs te /
T02D1654:190b-37: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o zhes pa slob ma lhag par gnas pa byas nas /
T02D1654:190b-38: tho rangs gtor ma byin te dkyil 'khor gyi khang
T02D1654:190b-39: pa nas byung la slob ma la rmi lam dris
T02D1654:191a-0: te / snying po'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor gyi @191a * //
T02D1654:191a-1: khang par 'byor ba ji lta bar mchod nas lha'i 'khor lo dngos su der gnas par mos la /
T02D1654:191a-2: rang gi blos gtso bo bla mar byas te 'chad
T02D1654:191a-3: par 'gyur ba'i slob ma gzhug pa'i cho gas rang
T02D1654:191a-4: nyid dang por dkyil 'khor du zhugs la /
T02D1654:191a-5: rigs kyi bdag pos bdag nyid la dbang bskur gyi mthar thug pa bsgrubs nas /
T02D1654:191a-6: de nyid las slob dpon gyis las kun la gnang ba thob ste /
T02D1654:191a-8: bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog / shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor yin //
T02D1654:191a-9: bden pa de yis mgon po khyod //
T02D1654:191a-10: bdag gi 'dod pa yongs rdzogs mdzod //
T02D1654:191a-11: chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang mnyam pa //
T02D1654:191a-12: dangs shing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02D1654:191a-13: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1654:191a-14: rgyu dang las la yang dag byung //
T02D1654:191a-15: de nyid de bzhin nyid las skyes //
T02D1654:191a-16: de lta'i bden pas dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1654:191a-17: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma rnams //
T02D1654:191a-18: kun gyis sdig med mthong bar shog / ces pas so //
T02D1654:191a-19: de'i rjes su slob ma khrus byed du bcug la /
T02D1654:191a-20: dri bzang po la sogs pas gtsang spra can du 'gyur ba /
T02D1654:191a-21: gos dmar po'i smad g-yogs dang stod g-yogs can /
T02D1654:191a-22: gdong g-yogs dmar po bcings pa /
T02D1654:191a-23: dpal he ru ka'i gzugs su dmigs pa la /
T02D1654:191a-24: a'a kham b'i ra h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis me
T02D1654:191a-25: tog gzung bas yol ba'i phyi ngos su yon phul
T02D1654:191a-26: ba las thams cad pa'i bum chus gtor ba /
T02D1654:191a-27: h'um yig gis dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor bzhag pa la /
T02D1654:191a-28: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i don dri bar bya ste /
T02D1654:191a-29: kye khyod su yin zhes pa'o //
T02D1654:191a-30: des bdag ni rgyal ba'i sras zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1654:191a-32: aom sarba yo ga tsittam autp'a da y'a mi zhes pa 'dis byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas /
T02D1654:191a-33: me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar h'um su ra te sam ya stvam ho:/
T02D1654:191a-34: siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham zhes brjod cing gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1654:191a-35: de nas spyi bor rdo rje bzhag nas brjod par bya ste /
T02D1654:191a-36: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje ste /
T02D1654:191a-37: gal te khyod kyis 'di 'ga' zhig la smras na spyi bo 'gems par byed do //
T02D1654:191b-0: de nas snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas @191b 'di skad brjod de /
T02D1654:191b-1: aom da ni rdo rje sems dpa' rang //
T02D1654:191b-2: khyod kyis snying la yang dag zhugs //
T02D1654:191b-3: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D1654:191b-4: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs /
T02D1654:191b-5: zhes pa 'dis mna' byed du bcug ste /
T02D1654:191b-6: padma'i snod du 'dug pa yi ge gsum gyis byin
T02D1654:191b-7: gyis brlabs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga bsres pa'i bum pa'i
T02D1654:191b-9: aom panytsa aa mri ta au da ka tha: h'um zhes pa 'dis lan bdun du bzlas pa /
T02D1654:191b-10: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D1654:191b-11: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D1654:191b-12: dam tshig bsrungs las dngos grub ste //
T02D1654:191b-13: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig /
T02D1654:191b-14: ces brjod cing 'thung du gzhug go //
T02D1654:191b-15: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par mi bya ste /
T02D1654:191b-16: khyod dam tshig nyams nas dmyal bar song bar gyur ta re zhes brjod nas /
T02D1654:191b-17: bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar bas /
T02D1654:191b-18: dkyil 'khor du ni slob ma dag / bdag gis yang dag bcug pa 'di //
T02D1654:191b-19: lha rnams rigs kyi rim pa ni //
T02D1654:191b-20: bsod nams ji lta de ltar shog /'di yis dngos grub ci 'drar 'gyur //
T02D1654:191b-21: rigs gang la ni snod yin dang //
T02D1654:191b-22: bsod nams mthu yang gang 'dra ba //
T02D1654:191b-23: de 'dra dkyil 'khor du gyur cig / ces pa bden pa'i byin rlabs byas te /
T02D1654:191b-24: yi ge lngas sngar bzung ba'i me tog tram yig
T02D1654:191b-25: gis byin gyis brlabs pa h'um yig gis dkyil 'khor
T02D1654:191b-27: aom badzra he ru ka badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha h'um zhes 'don du gzhug go //
T02D1654:191b-28: 'phangs pa'i me tog de slob ma'i mgo la 'ching zhing /
T02D1654:191b-29: kye stobs po che khyod kyis 'di slar zung shig ces brjod do //
T02D1654:191b-30: de'i rjes su slob ma'i snying gar zla ba la bdag po dang /
T02D1654:191b-31: dpral bar ra yig dang mig gnyis la aom yig gnyis bsgoms nas /
T02D1654:191b-32: aom rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid deng //
T02D1654:191b-33: khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson //
T02D1654:191b-34: thams cad mig ni 'byed mdzad de //
T02D1654:191b-35: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02D1654:191b-36: ces 'don cing gdong g-yogs bsal nas /
T02D1654:191b-37: dgu yi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor du /
T02D1654:191b-38: aom he ru ka badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha h'um zhes
T02D1654:191b-39: pa la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyis bdug pa la
T02D1654:191b-40: sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyis kyang mchod de /
T02D1654:192a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi mtshan brjod pa sngon
T02D1654:192a-3: du 'gro bar bstan par bya'o zhes pa dkyil 'khor
T02D1654:192a-4: du 'jug pa'i rjes su thogs su slob mas yan
T02D1654:192a-5: lag lngas phyag byas pas pus mo g-yas pa sa
T02D1654:192a-6: la btsugs pa thal mo sbyar bas /
T02D1654:192a-8: dpung gnyen skyob pa po mdzod cig / bdag ni skal dman spro ba chung //
T02D1654:192a-9: sangs rgyas chos dang rnam bral las //
T02D1654:192a-10: kye kye mgon ston bla ma che //
T02D1654:192a-11: mgon po khyod kyis thugs rje mdzod //
T02D1654:192a-12: ces brjod pas gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D1654:192a-13: de la slob dpon gyis rang gi lta bar gtum
T02D1654:192a-14: mo 'bar bas bzhu ba'i bdud rtsis snying ga'i sa
T02D1654:192a-16: snying ga'i rtsa brgyad kyi rang bzhin gyi lha mo spros pa rnams dang /
T02D1654:192a-17: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D1654:192a-18: rig pa'i lha mo rnams dang bcas pa rnams la /
T02D1654:192a-19: snying rje can rnams 'di la dbang bskur stsal du gsol //
T02D1654:192a-20: yang yang phyag 'tshal thal sbyar gsol 'debs bgyid //
T02D1654:192a-26: rol mo la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D1654:192a-27: ye shes kyi chus gang ba'i bum pa dkar po'i
T02D1654:192a-28: phyag can bkra shis kyi glu len pa rnams kyis
T02D1654:192a-29: / gang gi tshe slob ma he ru ka'i gzugs
T02D1654:192a-30: can la dbang bskur bar mdzad pa de'i tshe man
T02D1654:192a-31: ji gnyis la gnas pa'i zangs snod dang /
T02D1654:192a-32: dung chos rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la sogs pa'i chus bkang nas /
T02D1654:192a-33: dang por rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa gnyis
T02D1654:192a-34: kyis bzung ba'i zangs snod kyi chu nyung du yis
T02D1654:192a-35: dang de'i rjes su dung gis /
T02D1654:192a-36: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02D1654:192a-37: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D1654:192a-38: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02D1654:192a-39: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02D1654:192a-40: aom he ru ka p'i ra stvam aa bhi shinyts'a
T02D1654:192a-41: mi zhes brjod cing khrus byed pa'i slob ma la
T02D1654:192a-42: cod pan gyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1654:192a-43: de ltar chu dang cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba
T02D1654:192a-44: dag gis dbang bskur ba'i slob ma la de ltar
T02D1654:192a-45: bzung ba'i dung gi zangs snod na gnas pa'i chu
T02D1654:192b-0: lhag ma bsres pa'i @192b chu lhag ma /
T02D1654:192b-1: le'u dang por brjod pa'i sngags /
T02D1654:192b-2: aom buddha zhes pa la sogs pa brjod cing /
T02D1654:192b-3: lan gsum blud do zhes pa'o //
T02D1654:192b-4: sbyar ba rnams zhes pa byas pa rnams so //
T02D1654:192b-5: gzhan rnams ni lhog pa la sogs pa'i lus la skyes pa'i dug rnams so //
T02D1654:192b-6: nye ba'i dug ni lam la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:192b-7: mda' dug gi chu zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1654:192b-8: byug pa zhes pa bza' ba'i don du bza' bya
T02D1654:192b-9: la sogs pa la byug pa rnams byas nas so
T02D1654:192b-10: // gang rnams zhes pa dug rnams so //
T02D1654:192b-11: de rnams zhes pa de thams cad do //
T02D1654:192b-12: de nyid du zhes pa gang gis gzung ba'am sbyin pa de rnams kho nar ro //
T02D1654:192b-13: sh'a li k'a byed pas zhes pa sh'a li k'a'i
T02D1654:192b-14: byed pa tsam gal te shes par 'dod na de
T02D1654:192b-15: kho nas shes par gyis shig / yang na dug
T02D1654:192b-16: zhi thabs te 'jig rten pa dang don dam pa
T02D1654:192b-17: thams cad ces pa'i don to //
T02D1654:192b-18: stong phrag ces pa la sogs pa la stong phrag
T02D1654:192b-19: brgya'i nang na gang bsam pa rnam par dag pa
T02D1654:192b-22: sbrul zhes pa la sogs pa la sprul gyis zin pa la'o //
T02D1654:192b-23: de bzhin zhes pa mi brtson pa'o //
T02D1654:192b-25: gzung ba la ji srid du dug gso thabs gzhan
T02D1654:192b-26: sngags dang sbyor ba la sogs pa'i las byed pa'am
T02D1654:192b-27: / byed par 'gyur ba de srid sangs rgyas thod
T02D1654:192b-28: pa'i rnal 'byor pas spro bar mi bya'i 'di ni
T02D1654:192b-29: dus su bzung ba ste shi ba'o zhes dug gsod
T02D1654:192b-30: pa gzhan rnams kyis dor ba na bzung ba la
T02D1654:192b-32: 'od zer rnams zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1654:192b-33: bdag nyid he ru ka'i gzugs can gyi snying ga'i
T02D1654:192b-34: sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis nor rgyas la
T02D1654:192b-35: sogs pa'i klu'i gnas su bskul bas klu'i snying skams
T02D1654:192b-36: pa ci bgyi zhes zer ba'i klu rnams la gsungs
T02D1654:192b-37: pa'o // sngon zhes pa le'u dang por te /
T02D1654:192b-38: 'dir yang sangs rgyas thod pa gsungs pa zhes dran du 'jug ste /
T02D1654:192b-39: khyed rnams sngags kyi 'od zer gyis zil gyis mnan pa bcom ldan 'das ma la zhus nas /
T02D1654:192b-40: de'i bka' khas blangs pa zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
T02D1654:192b-41: de nas 'gyur zhes pa 'di ltar rig pa sgrub
T02D1654:192b-42: pa ma yin zhes pa klu rnams kyis gsol ba'o
T02D1654:193a-1: bzhud cig / gang gi phyir dus su zin pa med cing /
T02D1654:193a-2: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med de /
T02D1654:193a-3: 'dzin par byed pa dus su zin pa las gzhan med do //
T02D1654:193a-4: dogs pa ste dogs pa can dug gis 'chi ba la dogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1654:193a-6: ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung ba ni ba ser skya'i'o //
T02D1654:193a-7: de sa 'dab chags ri skegs dang ri skegs mo yang bya'o //
T02D1654:193a-8: snod dkar po ni 'bras dkar po btags pa las byas pa ste /
T02D1654:193a-9: der 'dab chags gnyis po de gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1654:193a-10: der dung la sogs pa'i snod dkar por ro bsregs
T02D1654:193a-11: pa'i sol ba mnyes pa'i snag tsha bzhag cing des
T02D1654:193a-12: ka ra b'i ra dkar po'i 'dri smyug gis ri
T02D1654:193a-13: skegs kyi sngags bri bar bya'o //
T02D1654:193a-14: pho dang mo ru zhes pa mo ni ri skegs mo ste /
T02D1654:193a-15: de'i pho ni ri skegs so //
T02D1654:193a-16: 'di ni khyad par la ste de'i phyir des bris
T02D1654:193a-17: pa'i sngags kyi gro ga la sogs pa'i 'dra ba
T02D1654:193a-18: ma gnyis ri skegs kyi snying gar dang ri skegs
T02D1654:193a-19: mo'i snying gar bzhag go zhes bstan to //
T02D1654:193a-20: snag tsha sbyin par bya zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1654:193a-21: snag tsha des ri skegs gnyis la byug cing bris la /
T02D1654:193a-22: bdag nyid kyi mig la phyogs par bzhag ste /
T02D1654:193a-23: bden pa'i ri skegs gnyis bzhin du blta zhing ka
T02D1654:193a-24: ra b'i ra dkar po'i lo mas sngags lan bdun
T02D1654:193a-25: bdun brjod cing bkug pa'i lha'i ri skegs gnyis dang
T02D1654:193a-27: aom zhes pa la sogs pa sv'a h'a'i mthar thug pa ni sngags gcig go //
T02D1654:193a-28: zhugs zhes pa ri skegs de gnyis song nas klu'i gnas su zhugs pa'o //
T02D1654:193a-29: gang gis zhes pa la sogs pa 'dzin pa po'i klu'o //
T02D1654:193a-30: ri skegs mthu chen po can mthong nas ma shin yang long bar ni mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:193a-31: sh'a ki k'a rnams la ni sh'a li k'a dag la'o //
T02D1654:193a-32: gsol ba ni gsol ba rnams so //
T02D1654:193a-33: tshig ni sna tshogs sde ma la khas blangs pa'i tshig ste /
T02D1654:193a-34: rnam pa gzhan du mi bgyid pa'o //
T02D1654:193a-35: kha cig tu ma mdzad ces klog pa de'i tshe sprin la zhon gyi /
T02D1654:193a-36: klu nye bar mi 'tshe ba'i don du byed du
T02D1654:193a-37: bcug pa'i tshig gis bya khyung gi rgyal pos 'dab
T02D1654:193a-38: chags stobs po che thams cad la ngag bya ste
T02D1654:193b-0: / de'i phyir tshig de @193b rnam pa gzhan du ma mdzad cig ces pa'i don to //
T02D1654:193b-1: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ri skegs dang
T02D1654:193b-2: sh'a li k'a mo dag gis mgo dang mjug ma
T02D1654:193b-3: dag gzung nas zin pa'i mdun du khyer 'ong ba'i
T02D1654:193b-4: sbrul long ba la 'gugs pa'i sngags kyis mngon par
T02D1654:193b-5: sngags pa'i sbrul gyi khung bu'i sa yis 'gugs pa'i
T02D1654:193b-6: sngags brjod pa sngon du 'gro bar brabs pa la
T02D1654:193b-7: / mig byung ba zin pa mthong ba la rkang pa nas mgo bo'i mthar thug pa dang /
