T02D1654:196b-37: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang mo'i grong //
T02D1654:196b-38: dkyil 'khor la ni bu khyod ltos //
T02D1654:196b-39: zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor bstan no //
T02D1654:196b-40: de nas 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag ces
T02D1654:196b-41: pa la sogs pas gsol ba btab pa la gtum
T02D1654:197a-0: mos zhu ba'i byang chub kyi sems @197a * //
T02D1654:197a-1: gyi bdud rtsis 'khrud bzhin pa dang /
T02D1654:197a-2: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i
T02D1654:197a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dang rig pa'i lha mo rnams
T02D1654:197a-4: steng gi sgo nas zhugs te zhu bar gyur ba'i
T02D1654:197a-5: rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ba rnams kyis mi bskyod
T02D1654:197a-6: pa'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems kyi chus /
T02D1654:197a-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni dbang //
T02D1654:197a-8: gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //
T02D1654:197a-9: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D1654:197a-10: rdo rje chen po sbyin par bya //
T02D1654:197a-12: aom shr'i tsakra w'i ra stv'am aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02D1654:197a-13: zhes pa'i sngags kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes chu'i dbang bskur ro //
T02D1654:197a-14: de nas chu de rin chen 'byung ldan gyi bdag nyid kyi cod pan du bsgom zhing /
T02D1654:197a-16: sarba yo gi n-yo ku ku te aa tra aa dhi tishthantu /
T02D1654:197a-18: zhes brjod par bya'i zhes pa cod pan no //
T02D1654:197a-19: 'od dpag med kyi bdag nyid kyi rdo rje lag pa g-yas pas snying gar /
T02D1654:197a-20: he ru ka dpal sogs dpa' bos //
T02D1654:197a-21: de ring khyod ni dbang bskur ro /
T02D1654:197a-22: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D1654:197a-23: rdo rje rab tu grub ched zung //
T02D1654:197a-24: zhes brjod cing 'dzin du gzhug go zhes pa rdo rje'o //
T02D1654:197a-25: don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin gyi dril bu lag pa g-yon pas snying gar 'dzin du gzhug cing /
T02D1654:197a-26: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02D1654:197a-27: dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro dril bur bshad //
T02D1654:197a-28: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzung //
T02D1654:197a-29: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02D1654:197a-30: ces brjod cing 'khyud pa'i tshul byed du gzhug go zhes pa bdag po'o //
T02D1654:197a-31: de nas slob ma'i mgo bor rdo rje dang dril bu mnyam par 'dzin du gzhug cing /
T02D1654:197a-32: aom shr'i tsa kra aa dhi pa ti shr'i he
T02D1654:197a-33: ru ka w'i ra stv'am aa bhi shinytsa mi che
T02D1654:197a-34: ge mo rdo rje khyod do zhes brjod do zhes
T02D1654:197a-35: pa ming ngo // aom buddha ka p'a li n'i
T02D1654:197a-36: a'a: h'e he h'um phat ces pa bdag po'i snying
T02D1654:197a-37: po 'don du gzhug go zhes pa'i sngags so //
T02D1654:197a-38: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D1654:197a-39: he ru ka dpal go 'phang gnas //
T02D1654:197a-40: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung //
T02D1654:197a-41: he ru ka dpal brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D1654:197a-42: zhes brjod cing rdo rje sbyin no //
T02D1654:197a-43: des kyang aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra
T02D1654:197a-44: sa ma ya tishatha ae sha stvam dh'a ra y'a
T02D1654:197a-45: mi / aom ha ha ha ha h'i: zhes brjod
T02D1654:197b-0: cing gzung bar bya'o zhes pa rdo rje'i brtul @197b
T02D1654:197b-1: mi / zhugs so // he ru ka dpal phyag rgya 'di //
T02D1654:197b-2: phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas //
T02D1654:197b-3: de nas kha tv'am cang te'u snod //
T02D1654:197b-4: byin pa dpa' bos gzung bar gyis //
T02D1654:197b-5: zhes brjod cing kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D1654:197b-6: cang te'u dang thod pa rnams sbyin par bya'o zhes pa spyod pa'i brtul zhugs so //
T02D1654:197b-7: lag pa g-yon pas chos gos kya rna ba bzung nas //
T02D1654:197b-8: lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pas /
T02D1654:197b-9: rang nyid sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
T02D1654:197b-10: 'khor lo gsum gyi dbang phyug ngas //
T02D1654:197b-11: he ru ka dpal zhes bya yi //
T02D1654:197b-12: de bzhin gshegs par khyod lung bstan //
T02D1654:197b-13: dpal he ru ka zhes pa'i ming can gyi de
T02D1654:197b-14: bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub sa ma ya stvam bhur
T02D1654:197b-15: bhu wa sva: zhes brjod de lung bstan pa'o //
T02D1654:197b-17: gang gis bdag ni da ltar nyid //
T02D1654:197b-18: rgyu med 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02D1654:197b-19: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che //
T02D1654:197b-20: dpa' bo chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D1654:197b-21: zhes gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs su snying ga'i
T02D1654:197b-22: sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i mtha'
T02D1654:197b-23: yas pa'i phyogs na bzhugs pa'i dpa' bo dang lha
T02D1654:197b-24: mo rnams sngar bzhin bcug ste rdo rje nas phyung
T02D1654:197b-25: nas ye shes kyi chus gang ba'i bum pa'i phyag
T02D1654:197b-26: rgya can rnams kyis bkra shis dang /
T02D1654:197b-29: bkur sti rgya chen pos dbang bskur zhing /
T02D1654:197b-30: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02D1654:197b-31: khams gsum po yis phyag byas pa //
T02D1654:197b-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02D1654:197b-33: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1654:197b-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya sh'i h'um zhes brjod do //
T02D1654:197b-35: de nas mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsams la ;
T02D1654:197b-36: dpa' bo dang lha mo gzhan de nyid du ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bor bcug la /
T02D1654:197b-37: aom su pra tishtha badzra sv'a h'a /
T02D1654:197b-38: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags brjod do //
T02D1654:197b-39: de'i rjes su bka' bsgo bar bya ste /
T02D1654:197b-40: de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1654:197b-41: mi bya cung zad med de'i phyir //
T02D1654:197b-42: dpa' bos de nyid shes nas ni //
T02D1654:197b-43: khyod kyis 'dod pa lnga spyod cig / sems can gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te //
T02D1654:197b-45: de rnams khams gsum pas shes nas //
T02D1654:197b-46: khyod kyis sems can don nus kyis //
T02D1654:197b-47: zhes pa phyir mi ldog pa'o //
T02D1654:198a-1: 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag / ces pa la sogs pas bla ma la dang /
T02D1654:198a-3: rnam rtog ming dang bdag ldan pas //
T02D1654:198a-4: bag chags yang dag bcang ba yis //
T02D1654:198a-5: mdzes ma khyod kyis bskyab par mdzod //
T02D1654:198a-6: grangs pa chen mo thugs rjer ldan //
T02D1654:198a-7: de ni nye bar zhi bar mdzod //
T02D1654:198a-8: ces pas shes rab ma la gsol ba btab par byas pa la /
T02D1654:198a-9: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D1654:198a-10: spyan drangs pa'i phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i dpa' bo dang
T02D1654:198a-11: lha mo rnams sngar bzhin bcug ste zhu bar gyur
T02D1654:198a-12: nas phyung ba'i byang sems snying po'i sngags brjod cing
T02D1654:198a-13: dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i blos phyi rol du gnas
T02D1654:198a-14: pa'i slob ma mthe bong dang ming med bdag gis
T02D1654:198a-15: bcing la rdo rje padma las phyung ste dngos su
T02D1654:198a-17: slob mas ni aa ho su kha zhes smra zhing btung ngo //
T02D1654:198a-18: shes rab mas kyang langs la /
T02D1654:198a-19: rang gi chu skyes kyi nang gi byang chub sems
T02D1654:198a-20: kyi lhag ma me tog gi bcud kyi thig le
T02D1654:198a-21: de'i kha'i nang du gos med pa kho nas 'jug
T02D1654:198a-22: par bya'o zhes pa shes rab dang thabs dag gi
T02D1654:198a-23: gsang bas dbang bskur ba'i zhes pa gsang ba'o //
T02D1654:198a-24: de nas sngar bzhin du bla ma dang shes rab ma la gsol ba btab pa la /
T02D1654:198a-25: shes rab ma de'am gzhan yang rung bas bka' bsgo ba /
T02D1654:198a-26: dpa' bo byang chub sems bza' bar //
T02D1654:198a-27: khyod ni spro bar gyur tam ci //
T02D1654:198a-28: rigs lnga las byung rig ma ni //
T02D1654:198a-29: gus pas yang dag mchod byed dam //
T02D1654:198a-30: bshad gci stobs dang khrag la sogs //
T02D1654:198a-31: gzhan yang dam tshig bzang po ni //
T02D1654:198a-32: de ring rab tu za byed dam //
T02D1654:198a-33: bu khyod ji ltar 'dod pa smros //
T02D1654:198a-36: ji skad brjod pa'i dam tshig sogs //
T02D1654:198a-37: lha mo bdag ni cis mi spro //
T02D1654:198a-38: bud med padma mchod pa dang //
T02D1654:198a-39: rtag tu gus pa cis mi bgyi //
T02D1654:198a-41: de nas des padma gsal bar byas te /
T02D1654:198a-42: thar pa bstan cig ho: zhes brjod do //
T02D1654:198a-43: des kyang bla ma'i man ngag las dga' ba la
T02D1654:198a-44: sogs pa'i dbye pa khong du chud pas rol par
T02D1654:198a-45: ba'o // padma'i nam mkha' dang nor bu'i lte ba bdag btsir ba'i gnas su /
T02D1654:198b-0: rdo rje skyil @198b krung las sems ni //
T02D1654:198b-1: nor bu'i nang du gnas blta zhing //
T02D1654:198b-2: de las skyes pa'i ye shes gang //
T02D1654:198b-3: de gzugs zhes pa brjod mi nus //
T02D1654:198b-4: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1654:198b-5: bar mar dmigs pa ma yin te //
T02D1654:198b-6: gsum po spangs pa kho na las //
T02D1654:198b-7: lhan skyes byang chub brjod par bya //
T02D1654:198b-8: gang du dbang po nyams par 'gyur //
T02D1654:198b-9: bdag gi rang bzhin rnam par nyams //
T02D1654:198b-10: lhan cig skyes dga' rtogs de yin //
T02D1654:198b-11: bla ma'i zhal la gsal 'dri na'o //
T02D1654:198b-13: rnal 'byor pa yis byang chub sems //
T02D1654:198b-14: ji srid gtong par mi byad pa //
T02D1654:198b-15: de srid par ma chad par ni //
T02D1654:198b-16: dga' skyes bde ba ci yang 'thob //
T02D1654:198b-17: dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gter //
T02D1654:198b-18: byang chub sems ni lhung ba na //
T02D1654:198b-19: phung po rnam shes brgyal ba la //
T02D1654:198b-20: dngos grub ma smad ga la yod //
T02D1654:198b-21: ces pas ji ltar nus par bzung ste /
T02D1654:198b-22: dal bus btang nas de kho na nyid la lta
T02D1654:198b-23: bas byang chub kyi sems dam tshig gi ngo bo
T02D1654:198b-24: chu skyes nas lces blang bar bya'o //
T02D1654:198b-25: de'i rjes su des mgo bor rkang pa g-yon pa bzhag nas bka' bsgo ste /
T02D1654:198b-26: bu khyod de ring nas brtsams te /
T02D1654:198b-27: ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar //
T02D1654:198b-28: rmi 'drar sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D1654:198b-29: don ni bdag nyid kun gyis byos //
T02D1654:198b-30: zhes pas te shes rab ye shes so //
T02D1654:198b-32: rig ma 'di ni spangs nas thabs //
T02D1654:198b-33: gzhan gyis sangs rgyas nyid min phyir //
T02D1654:198b-34: brtul zhugs gong ma'i gong ma ste //
T02D1654:198b-35: mnyes gshin rig ma'i brtul zhugs spyod //
T02D1654:198b-36: ces brjod de rig ma'i brtul zhugs so //
T02D1654:198b-37: de'i rjes su shes rab ye shes blangs pa kho
T02D1654:198b-38: na'i slob ma la shes rab ye shes kho na
T02D1654:198b-39: goms pa las rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo bzhi
T02D1654:198b-40: ba'o zhes tshig kho nas dbang bskur bzhi ba bla
T02D1654:198b-41: ma'i man ngag las rtogs par bya ba'i khyad par
T02D1654:198b-42: sbyin no // dpal sam pu tar gsungs pa //
T02D1654:198b-43: ji skad brjod pa'i cho gas dbang byin nas //
T02D1654:198b-44: slob ma'i mos pa yid kyis blta bya ste //
T02D1654:198b-45: zab cing rgya che'i tshul la mos pa la //
T02D1654:198b-46: dbang bskur rin chen tshig nyid kyis sbyin bya //
T02D1654:199a-0: @199a * // gang slob ma dbang po 'bring po de la /
T02D1654:199a-1: phyi rol du bsgoms pa'i shes rab ye shes kyi
T02D1654:199a-2: rang bzhin la chos 'byung gi padma'i nang du dpag
T02D1654:199a-3: tshad bye pa'i tshad can yid kyi rang bzhin rim
T02D1654:199a-4: pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ji ltar rigs
T02D1654:199a-5: par brjod pa'i cho gas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1654:199a-6: gang bsod nams bsags pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis po 'di
T02D1654:199a-7: bskyed par nus pa'i bla mas sprul pa gsal bar
T02D1654:199a-8: mthong ba de ni dbang po mchog gi mchog yin
T02D1654:199a-9: te // de la yang 'di ltar dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1654:199a-10: dbang po rtul po ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du'i //
T02D1654:199a-11: de ltar gdams pa phye nas bya ste /
T02D1654:199a-12: gdams pa nyams pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1654:199a-13: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la dkyil 'khor gsungs nas
T02D1654:199a-14: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor brjod pa'i ched du gsungs pa
T02D1654:199a-15: / ci ru zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1654:199a-16: ci ru zhes pa don dam par rten 'gog pa'o //
T02D1654:199a-17: ci zhig ces pa lha'i ngo bo'i brten pa 'gog pa'o //
T02D1654:199a-18: dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa la sogs pa bsod nams sgrub
T02D1654:199a-19: par byed pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub chen po'i
T02D1654:199a-21: de ltar yang ring ba dang mngon par shes pa
T02D1654:199a-22: la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis stong pa'o zhes
T02D1654:199a-23: gsungs pa / lhung zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1654:199a-24: brdzun la zhes pa rnam par rtog pas sgro btags pa brdzun pa'i ngo bo la'o //
T02D1654:199a-25: cal col zhes pa g-yeng ba rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D1654:199a-26: su myur du rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub pa'i lam
T02D1654:199a-27: las grol ba'i 'gro ba lhung ngo zhes thugs brtse
T02D1654:199a-28: bar mdzad do // 'o na sgro ma btags pa ci zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1654:199a-29: stong pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:199a-30: mtha' dag ces pa phung po dang khams la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:199a-32: ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1654:199a-33: padma zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1654:199a-34: bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i padma'i dbus su gnas pa'o //
T02D1654:199a-35: rnal 'byor ma tshogs ni rtsa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1654:199a-36: ha ru ka ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1654:199a-37: de kho na nyid ste bde ba chen po'i bdag
T02D1654:199b-0: nyid stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa @199b rmi
T02D1654:199b-2: sgyu ma la sogs pa'i rnag bzhin ni phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bor skye'i zhes gsungs pa //
T02D1654:199b-3: mtha' dag skyed byed ces pa'o //
T02D1654:199b-4: de'i phyir rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor blang bar bya ba 'di bsgo mas la mthong bar gyis shig pa'o //
T02D1654:199b-5: de dril bu zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1654:199b-6: sems gnas las kyi thig dang ni //
T02D1654:199b-7: rdul tshon dgye ba'i rim las byung //
T02D1654:199b-9: rang bzhin gyis grub gnyis med pa'o //
T02D1654:199b-10: bcos ma gnyis kyi ngo bo gang //
T02D1654:199b-11: de ni gdul bya'i dbang las 'dod //
T02D1654:199b-12: de ni thar 'dod bsgrung bya min //
T02D1654:199b-13: thar pa yang dag don mthong las //
T02D1654:199b-15: gal te rnam pa de ltar rdzogs pa yin na /
T02D1654:199b-16: 'o na de ni thams cad kyi tshe yod pa kho na ste /
T02D1654:199b-17: sgom pas kyang ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1654:199b-18: gnod pas te gnod pa ni phyin ci log pa ste /
T02D1654:199b-19: rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyi phung po la sogs pa la rmongs pas so //
T02D1654:199b-20: de'i phyir ltos te blang bya dang dor bya la
T02D1654:199b-21: rmongs pa la nges par dpyod cig / skyen par
T02D1654:199b-22: ni myur bar te ji srid du dal 'byor phun
T02D1654:199b-23: sum tshogs pa yid brten du med pa 'di yid
T02D1654:199b-24: kyi bar du'o zhes sgom pa la sbyor ba'o //
T02D1654:199b-25: 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u drug pa'o /
T02D1654:199b-27: // / da ni 'bras bu'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D1654:199b-28: sgom pa brjod pa'i ched du gdul bya'i skye bo'i
T02D1654:199b-29: ngor re zhig phyi'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa /
T02D1654:199b-30: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:199b-31: ri bo zhes pa la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1654:199b-32: zlum po zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1654:199b-33: de la rim pa 'di yin te /
T02D1654:199b-34: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i cho ga ji lta bar yongs su sbyang pa'am //
T02D1654:199b-35: lag pas reg nas sa sbyong ba'i sngags brgyad lhag
T02D1654:199b-36: pa'i brgya bzlas pas sbyang spar kho bos byas pa'i
T02D1654:199b-37: dus 'khor la 'jug par brjod pa'i rigs pas thar
T02D1654:199b-38: ma'i grib ma dang nya dag gis phyogs dang phyogs
T02D1654:199b-39: bral nges par byas nas lha'i sku can gtor ma
T02D1654:199b-41: dang por shar du kha bltas par gyur nas //
T02D1654:199b-42: so sor ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de bzhin
T02D1654:199b-43: gshegs pa lngar bsgom sa ba'i skud pa nyi shu
T02D1654:200a-0: @200a * // / g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis lte bar bzung bas /
T02D1654:200a-1: slob ma lha'i sku can dang /
T02D1654:200a-2: lhan cig tu ye shes kyi thig ces bya ba tshangs pa'i thig gnyis nam mkha' la btab nas /
T02D1654:200a-3: 'og tu sa gzhi la tshangs pa'i thig de ltar drang por gdab bo //
T02D1654:200a-4: de nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par 'grub pa'i ched du nya'i kha dang /
T02D1654:200a-5: mjug ma dag gi steng du tshangs thig gnyis pa byang du kha phyogs pas gdab bo //
T02D1654:200a-6: de nas zur thig gnyis pa cho ga ji lta bar gdab bo //
T02D1654:200a-7: de nas khru gang pa la sogs pa'i tshad can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig bzhi'o //
T02D1654:200a-8: de nas tshangs thig gnyis kyi phyi rol du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su 'gro zhing /
T02D1654:200a-9: rdul tshon gyi sa'i tshad kyis thig gcig dor nas thig bzhi'o //
T02D1654:200a-11: de'i rjes su thig gnyis dor nas lha'i snam bu'i thig gcig go //
T02D1654:200a-12: de ltar tshangs thig nas bzung nas rtsa ba'i thig
T02D1654:200a-13: dang bcas pa thig bcu rnams longs gcig tu ste
T02D1654:200a-14: / logs gzhan du yang rim pa di ltar ro //
T02D1654:200a-15: de nas rtsa ba'i thig las phyi rol du 'khor
T02D1654:200a-16: lo'i brgyad cha'i sgo bzhi cha'i tshad du rdul tshon
T02D1654:200a-18: de nas sgo'i phyed kyi tshad du lha'i stegs bu'i thig gcig go //
T02D1654:200a-19: de nas tshon gyi sa'i tshad kyis rin chen snam bu'i thig gcig go //
T02D1654:200a-20: de nas nam bu'i tshad du dra ba dang da ba phyed pa'i snam bu'i thig gcig go //
T02D1654:200a-21: de nas chos kyi sa'i tshad kyis ba ku l'i'i snam bu'i'am //
T02D1654:200a-22: kha cig gi lugs la slar yang rin chen snam bu'i thig gcig go //
T02D1654:200a-23: de nas mun pa'i snam bu'i thig thung ba gcig ste /
T02D1654:200a-24: de kho na la mda' yab rnams so //
T02D1654:200a-25: de nas dbyi ba'i ngal bas 'jigs pas thig thung gis sam ring pos kyang rung ste /
T02D1654:200a-26: sgo las sum 'gyur rta babs kyi thig bzhi'o //
T02D1654:200a-27: de nas thig gnyis dor nas rta babs dang 'brel ba'i thig gcig go //
T02D1654:200a-28: de nas thig gsum dor nas dril bu dang bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan dang /
T02D1654:200b-2: dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pa'i gnas kyi thig gcig go //
T02D1654:200b-3: slar yang thig gcig dor nas thig gcig go //
T02D1654:200b-4: de nas padma'i 'dab ma'i phreng ba'i thig gcig go //
T02D1654:200b-5: de nyid kyi phyir padma'i lte ba'i nang du gnas
T02D1654:200b-6: pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la khang ba
T02D1654:200b-8: lte ba de'i phyi rol padma'i lte ba la ni
T02D1654:200b-9: sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra dang rta babs la sogs
T02D1654:200b-10: pa bri'o // de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba'i thig gcig go //
T02D1654:200b-11: de nas thig gnyis dor nas 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i thig gcig go //
T02D1654:200b-12: padma'i 'dab ma'i phreng ba med do zhes kha cig go //
T02D1654:200b-13: kong ka na ni rdo rje dang /
T02D1654:200b-15: 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i thig bzhi rnams so zhes smra'o //
T02D1654:200b-16: de ltar tshon gyi sa'i thig nas brtsam te thig bcu drug rnams ngos gcig tu'o //
T02D1654:200b-17: de ltar ngos gzhan du yang ngo zhes pa thig
T02D1654:200b-18: nyi shu rtsa drug rim pa gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1654:200b-20: phogs 'di kho nas rim pa gsum pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du thig gdab par ba'o //
T02D1654:200b-21: de ltar gcig gi tshe thig btab pas //
T02D1654:200b-28: ji srid du 'bum la sogs pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par shes par ba'o //
T02D1654:200b-29: 'dir rta babs la sogs pa rnams su nang gi thig gi khyad par dang /
T02D1654:200b-30: sa spyang pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1654:200b-32: tshon dgye ba la sogs pa rgyas par kho bo cag gis dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bshad do //
T02D1654:200b-33: rdo rje gsum gyis yongs su bskor //
T02D1654:200b-36: dkar po'i rdo rje'i phreng ba gsum rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1654:200b-37: yud kyis zhes pa h'um yig gcig kho na las rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /
T02D1654:200b-38: bcom ldan 'das te nyi shu rtsa lnga bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1654:200b-39: de ru phyung ba zhes pa bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa'i dus su h'um yig las so //
T02D1654:200b-40: kha dog lnga'i rnam brgyan pa ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1654:200b-41: h'um yig bdag nyid ni h'um yig las skyes pa'i
T02D1654:200b-42: bdag nyid gang la yod pa de la de skad
T02D1654:201a-1: dang dkar mo ljang gu rnams //
T02D1654:201a-5: gsum par gnas pa rnams go rims bzhin no //
T02D1654:201a-6: sgo skyong ma rnams ni nag po ste rim pa dbus mar gnas pa ltar ro //
T02D1654:201a-7: mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can //
T02D1654:201a-8: zhes pa dbus na gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa gtso
T02D1654:201a-9: bo nyid kyis gsungs pa ste gsungs pa yang sangs
T02D1654:201a-10: rgyas lnga'i cod pan can gyis brgyan pa zhes so
T02D1654:201a-11: // rnal 'byor ma kun zhes pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D1654:201a-12: de'i gzugs zhes pa ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dbu
T02D1654:201a-13: la rgyan btags pa de ltar de rnams kyang rgyas
T02D1654:201a-14: btab pa ste / 'on kyang de rnams kyi spyi
T02D1654:201a-15: bor gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo so
T02D1654:201a-16: so yin no zhes gsungs pa gtso bo zhes pa
T02D1654:201a-17: btab pa ste / la sogs pa'o // 'dod par bya ste 'dod du 'jug pa'o //
T02D1654:201a-18: rnal 'byor ma rnams ni phreng bzangs ma la sogs pa bzhi rnams so //
T02D1654:201a-19: bla ma kha cig sgo skyong ma rnams so zhes so //
T02D1654:201a-20: sgyid lug gyur pa ni gzhan gyi ngor sgyid lug par gyur pa ste /
T02D1654:201a-21: stong pa nyid gcig pu'i mthar thug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1654:201a-22: mig ces pa 'gro ba 'don par dam bcas pa'o //
T02D1654:201a-23: dran byed ni dran par byed pa'o //
T02D1654:201a-24: bdag po kye ni mtha' dag gi bdag po'o //
T02D1654:201a-25: bya ba zhes pa rang gi don tsam byas nas so //
T02D1654:201a-26: bdag po sngon zhes pa la sogs pa bdag pos
T02D1654:201a-27: sngon ji ltar dam bcas pa dran par gyis shig
T02D1654:201a-28: pa'o // sgyid lug ni sgyid lug pa ste 'khor
T02D1654:201a-29: ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nye bar gtses pa nyid kyi
T02D1654:201a-30: pa'o // phyir ro // log pa ni log par
T02D1654:201a-31: yongs su brtags pa la ste dngos po'i mtha' dang
T02D1654:201a-32: dngos po med pa'i mthar ro //
T02D1654:201a-33: nga rgyal zhes pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal lo //
T02D1654:201a-35: de ltar dngos por 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa /
T02D1654:201a-36: mthong zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1654:201a-37: rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs la 'dod pa yis stong pa
T02D1654:201a-38: nyid dang ro gcig pa'i bde ba chen po 'byung
T02D1654:201a-39: ba las dngos po dang dngos po med pa la
T02D1654:201a-40: sogs par mchog tu 'dzin pa zad par 'gyur ro
T02D1654:201a-42: sngon bzhin zhal dang phyag mtshan sogs //
T02D1654:201a-43: zhes pa rgyu rdo rje 'chang bzhin no //
T02D1654:201a-44: sku mdog ni 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang gi nag
T02D1654:201a-45: po rgyu rdo rje 'chang ga dkar po'i zhes rgyud
T02D1654:201b-0: gzhan du'o // @201b 'dir ni sngon po kho na'o //
T02D1654:201b-1: kha cig tu sngon bzhin sku mdog phyag mtshan sogs zhes klog ste /
T02D1654:201b-2: de'i tshe rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa yang sngon po'o zhes gsal lo //
T02D1654:201b-3: bzhengs so zhes pa ni sna tshogs sde ma dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1654:201b-4: 'o na me long ye shes la sogs pa'i rang
T02D1654:201b-5: bzhin zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs par yongs
T02D1654:201b-6: su gyur pa ni rgyu rdo rje 'dzin par gdams
T02D1654:201b-7: pa de ltar 'di yang ji ltar min zhe na
T02D1654:201b-8: ma yin te / zhu ba las byung ba'i h'um
T02D1654:201b-9: las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang bcas pa'i h'um yig
T02D1654:201b-11: de'i 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin nam zhe na /
T02D1654:201b-12: de ltar ma yin te shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams de'i ngo bor skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1654:201b-13: de ltar na gang du 'gro ba thams cad me
T02D1654:201b-14: long la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan du gyur pa so
T02D1654:201b-15: sor snang ba de me long ye shes so //
T02D1654:201b-16: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni gang gis de
T02D1654:201b-17: ltar gzugs brnyan du gyur ba'i 'gro ba mnyam pa
T02D1654:201b-19: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni gang gis de
T02D1654:201b-20: ltar mnyam par gzhag pa kho nas sems can rnams
T02D1654:201b-21: thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams so sor
T02D1654:201b-22: rtog pa'o // bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni
T02D1654:201b-23: gang gis de ltar so sor brtags pa'i 'gro ba'i
T02D1654:201b-24: bya ba'i rjes su sgrub pa'o //
T02D1654:201b-25: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye
T02D1654:201b-26: shes ni gang bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa
T02D1654:201b-27: gnyis las grol ba bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D1654:201b-28: snying rje dang shes rab gnyis su med pa chos
T02D1654:201b-29: kyi dbyings rtogs pa rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1654:201b-30: de nas 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1654:201b-31: ye shes 'di rnams ni las dang po bas lhag par mos pas sgom par byed de /
T02D1654:201b-32: 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid shin tu dang ba
T02D1654:201b-33: zla ba'i tshul can kho na ni me long dang
T02D1654:201b-34: zla ba dang nyi ma 'dus pa na bde ba
T02D1654:201b-35: chen po'i rang bzhin gyi yid kyis chos rnams thams
T02D1654:201b-36: cad gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid du yang tha dad
T02D1654:201b-37: pa mi mthong ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1654:201b-38: 'gro ba'i don la nges par rtog pa lhur len pa dang /
T02D1654:201b-39: sprul pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis de'i don
T02D1654:201b-40: byed pa de ltar gsal bar gyur ba'o zhes pa
T02D1654:202a-0: rdzogs pa ni de'i don nges par sems pas goms par @202a * //
T02D1654:202a-1: byed do zhes pa mang pos chog go //
T02D1654:202a-2: 'di ni 'dir gdams ngag ji lta bar bsgom pa'i rim pa ste /
T02D1654:202a-3: 'dir bsgom pa'i dbang du byas pa'i sngags pa lha
T02D1654:202a-4: mo bzhi'i glus bskul bas sad pa snga bar langs
T02D1654:202a-6: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba byas nas /
T02D1654:202a-7: ngur khrod la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun
T02D1654:202a-8: pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la rdo rje skyil
T02D1654:202a-9: krung gis 'dug pa shes rab dang bcas pa'am /
T02D1654:202a-10: shes rab med pa gcer bu skra grol ba las
T02D1654:202a-11: thams cad pa la kha lhor phyogs bzhi pa la
T02D1654:202a-12: sogs pa'i dbye bas ni rang nyid ji lta ba'i
T02D1654:202a-14: dam tshig gi rdzas bsten pa sngon ma can gyis
T02D1654:202a-15: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas bdud rtsi bsgrubs te
T02D1654:202a-16: / gtor ma byin nas rang gi snying gar nyi
T02D1654:202a-17: ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i h'um yig gi 'od
T02D1654:202a-18: zer gyi tshogs kyis 'og min na bzhugs pa'i bcom
T02D1654:202a-19: ldan 'das he ru ka gnyug ma'i sna tshogs sde
T02D1654:202a-20: / mas 'khyud pa / phreng bzangs ma la sogs
T02D1654:202a-21: pa rdo rje rol pa mo nyi shu rtsa bzhis
T02D1654:202a-23: bdag nyid la zhal phyogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i
T02D1654:202a-24: sku mdog la sogs pa can mdun gyi nam mkhar
T02D1654:202a-25: spyan drangs la / h'um yig la 'od zer de
T02D1654:202a-26: zhugs pa'i rjes thogs su h'um yig las cig car
T02D1654:202a-27: 'byung ba'i rdo rje lha mo rnams kyis mchod par
T02D1654:202a-28: spyan drangs la / bya'o // de la bcom ldan
T02D1654:202a-29: 'das kyi shar phyogs rdo rje brtan ma dang padma'i
T02D1654:202a-30: tshul gyis phyag gnyis kyis bzung ba'i thod pas gtso
T02D1654:202a-32: dbang ldan phyogs su rdo rje pho nya mo phyag gnyis kyis cang te'u sgrogs par byed do //
T02D1654:202a-33: me mtshams su rdo rje phag mo padma'i tshul gyis
T02D1654:202a-34: bzung ba'i thod pas rnam par snang mdzad gsol du
T02D1654:202a-35: 'jug pa'o // srin po'i mtshams su rdo rje ma
T02D1654:202a-36: de ltar bzung ba'i mchod yon gyi snod rdo rjer
T02D1654:202a-38: lhor rdo rje gtsigs ma lag pa dag gis rnga bo che brdung ba'o //
T02D1654:202a-39: rlung mtshams su rdo rje lte ba ma de ltar
T02D1654:202a-40: bzung ba'i thod pas ri dags mtshan can ma 'bul
T02D1654:202a-41: ba'o // chu'i phyogs su rdo rje 'jigs ma de
T02D1654:202b-0: ltar bzung ba'i @202b thod pas gcod byed ces rab
T02D1654:202b-1: tu grags pa ce sbyang gi sha gsol du 'jug
T02D1654:202b-2: ba'o // pa'o // byang du 'dod chags sde ma
T02D1654:202b-3: dang lhan cig de'i bdag nyid du gyur nas yang
T02D1654:202b-5: chags pa chen pos rjes su chags par byed pa'o //
T02D1654:202b-6: gar dang glu la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod nas phyag 'tshal te /
T02D1654:202b-7: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa 'di ltar bya'o //
T02D1654:202b-8: bdag gis bdag nyid kyi sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags shing slar yang mi bgyid do //
T02D1654:202b-9: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa
T02D1654:202b-10: dang so so skye bo thams cad kyi bsod nams
T02D1654:202b-11: thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D1654:202b-12: bdag nyid kyi bde ba thams cad bla na med
T02D1654:202b-13: par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
T02D1654:202b-15: dkon mchog gsum po 'di lta ste /
T02D1654:202b-16: sangs rgyas don mchog dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos dkon mchog dang /
T02D1654:202b-17: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i
T02D1654:202b-18: dge 'dun dkon mchog la byang chub kyi bar du
T02D1654:202b-19: skyabs su mchi'o // kye ma pa la bdag nyid sems can kun gyi don dang /
T02D1654:202b-22: ji srid du de rnams shin tu mthar thug pa'i
T02D1654:202b-23: mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa de
T02D1654:202b-24: bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i ched du
T02D1654:202b-25: de'i lam sgrub pas bla na med pa yang dag
T02D1654:202b-26: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub par
T02D1654:202b-27: bgyi'o // de'i rjes su 'og gi rlung gis bskul
T02D1654:202b-28: bas 'bar ba'i gtum mos 'khyud pa'i snying ga'i h'um
T02D1654:202b-30: khams ma lus pa za zhing /
T02D1654:202b-31: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1654:202b-32: zhes pa 'di nang gi brjod pa sngon ma can
T02D1654:202b-33: gyi don mngon du byed cing chos thams cad stong
T02D1654:202b-35: de'i rjes su sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs las
T02D1654:202b-36: ram gyi sa bon las skyes pa'i nyi mar h'um
T02D1654:202b-37: yig yongs su gyur ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i mthil
T02D1654:202b-38: la gnas pa'i h'um yig dag gis bskul ba'i 'od
T02D1654:202b-39: zer gyi yal ga rnams kyis rdo rjer ba dang
T02D1654:202b-40: gur dang mda'i dra ba dang bla re dang mtshams
T02D1654:203a-1: sprul ba'i steng du aa yig las skyes pa'i chos
T02D1654:203a-2: 'byung dkar po gru gsum gyi nang du chu skyes
T02D1654:203a-3: kyi lta bar gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte
T02D1654:203a-4: ba la yam las skyes pa ba dan gnyis pa
T02D1654:203a-5: can gzhu lta bu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po'i
T02D1654:203a-6: steng du ram yig yongs su gyur pa las dmar
T02D1654:203a-7: po gru gsum pa 'bar ba bdun 'phro ba'i me'i
T02D1654:203a-8: dkyil 'khor ro // der gnas pa bam las byung
T02D1654:203a-9: ba bum pas mtshan pa dkar zhing zlum pa'i chu'i
T02D1654:203a-10: dkyil 'khor la gnas pa lam yig yongs su gyur
T02D1654:203a-11: ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan pa gru bzhi pa
T02D1654:203a-12: gser gyi ngo bo yid du 'ong ba'o //
T02D1654:203a-13: de ltar rang rang gi sa bon gyis byin gyis
T02D1654:203a-14: brlabs pa'i 'byung ba bzhi po 'dres pa'i khang pa
T02D1654:203a-15: brtsegs pa na zlum po'i rim pa gsum pa phyi
T02D1654:203a-16: gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa rta babs bzhis brgyan
T02D1654:203a-17: pa do shal la sogs pa rnams dang lha mo
T02D1654:203a-18: rnams kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i stegs bu bzhi pa
T02D1654:203a-19: can rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin ka
T02D1654:203a-20: ba dang dril chung rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1654:203a-21: de'i dbus su 'khor lo nag po rtsibs brgyad pa
T02D1654:203a-22: la gnas pa'i sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i
T02D1654:203a-23: ste ba la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ro'o
T02D1654:203a-24: // de'i steng du snying gar nyi ma la a'a
T02D1654:203a-25: li nyis 'gyur yongs su gyur pa mtshan sum cu
T02D1654:203a-26: rtsa gnyis kyi rgyu zla ba'i gzugs me long ye
T02D1654:203a-28: ya ra wa wa da dha dang bcas pa'i gsal
T02D1654:203a-29: byed nyis 'gyur yongs su gyur pa dpe byad brgyad
T02D1654:203a-30: cu'i rgyu mtshan nyi ma mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
T02D1654:203a-31: shes kyi ngo bo de dag gi dbus su h'um
T02D1654:203a-32: las skyes pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i snying por
T02D1654:203a-33: gnas pa'i h'um yig shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag
T02D1654:203a-34: nyid can so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang
T02D1654:203a-35: bzhin no // de kho na 'od zer rnam pa
T02D1654:203a-36: lnga byung bas spros pa'i lha rnams kyis kun na
T02D1654:203a-37: sa 'gro ba'i don byed pa ni bya ba sgrub
T02D1654:203a-38: pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1654:203a-39: zla ba la sogs pa 'di yongs su gyur pa
T02D1654:203a-40: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang
T02D1654:203a-41: bzhin bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyu rdo
T02D1654:203a-42: rje 'chang chu shing gi me tog mngon par gsar
T02D1654:203a-43: pa kha 'bus pa lta bu'am rgyud gzhan gyi rigs
T02D1654:203a-44: pas kun da ltar dkar pa'i 'od can gyi sku
T02D1654:203a-46: pa lta bu'i phyag la sogs pa can sna tshogs
T02D1654:203b-1: h'um yig las bcom ldan 'das 'grub pa'i dus kho
T02D1654:203b-2: nar grub pa'i phreng ba bzang mo la sogs pa'i
T02D1654:203b-3: lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams kyis yongs su
T02D1654:203b-5: bdag gi bla ma kha cig ni skabs 'dir yang
T02D1654:203b-6: bcom ldan 'das lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhis phul
T02D1654:203b-7: ba thod pa na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga gsol
T02D1654:203b-9: de'i rjes su sna tshogs sde ma'i dbu dang mgrin
T02D1654:203b-10: pa dang thugs ka dang gsang ba dang brla dag
T02D1654:203b-11: la rim pa ji lta bur aom a'a: h'um sv'a
T02D1654:203b-12: h'a / zhes pa 'di rnams bsgom ste /
T02D1654:203b-13: phan tshun gyi bar du spros pa de rnams kyis
T02D1654:203b-14: 'di'i sku khyab par byas pas hr'i: yig las byung
T02D1654:203b-15: ba'i padma dmar po'i lte bar a'a: yig dmar po
T02D1654:203b-16: dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje h'um yig
T02D1654:203b-17: nag po las skyes shing rtse mo aom yig dkar
T02D1654:203b-18: pos byin gyis brlabs par bsgoms te /
T02D1654:203b-19: lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi sna tshogs sde ma
T02D1654:203b-20: dang han cig dbyer med pa rnams kyis rnam pa
T02D1654:203b-21: de lta bu'i rdo rje dang padma sbyor bas bcom
T02D1654:203b-22: ldan 'das la 'dod pa mdzad de bcom ldan 'das
T02D1654:203b-23: kyang ngo // aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa
T02D1654:203b-24: nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko&
T02D1654:203b-25: kyang ngo // ham / zhes pa'i sngags kyis dga'
T02D1654:203b-26: ba rtsom bzhin pa ni 'dod chags chen pos bcom
T02D1654:203b-27: ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig nyi ma'i steng du
T02D1654:203b-28: zhu bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dang po'i sbyor ba
T02D1654:203b-29: zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang po'o //
T02D1654:203b-30: de nas sngon gyi smon lam la ltes pa la
T02D1654:203b-31: zhu ba las spros pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams kyis
T02D1654:203b-32: mnga' bdag ma mthong bas gdung ba dang bcas par
T02D1654:203b-33: glu rnams kyis mgon po slong bar byed de //
T02D1654:203b-34: de la byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin phreng ba bzang mos ci yis khyod ni sgyid lug gyur /
T02D1654:203b-35: 'jig rten mgon pos ci zhig yin //
T02D1654:203b-36: gal te khyod tshig dran byed na //
T02D1654:203b-37: kun gyi bdag po bzhengs mdzod cig / ces pa'i glu 'dis so //
T02D1654:203b-38: thod pa can ma snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid kyis /
T02D1654:203b-39: bdag nyid bya ba byas nas ni //
T02D1654:203b-40: stong pa nyid la sems ma mdzad //
T02D1654:203b-41: skye kun srid pa 'jigs par lhung //
T02D1654:203b-42: rnal 'byor ma yi grogs po bzhengs //
T02D1654:203b-44: 'jigs ma dga' ba chen mo'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1654:203b-45: bdag po sngon gsungs dran par mdzod //
T02D1654:204a-1: ma mdzad cig / khyod nub na ni skye bo kun //
T02D1654:204a-4: de ltar bskul ba'i rjes thogs su /
T02D1654:204a-5: zhu ba de las byung ba'i h'um las skyes pa'i
T02D1654:204a-6: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i h'um yongs su gyur ba'i
T02D1654:204a-7: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka mdog sngon po zhal
T02D1654:204a-8: gcig pa phyag bzhi pa phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis
T02D1654:204a-9: cang te'u dang gri gug dag dang /
T02D1654:204a-10: g-yon pas kha tv'am ga dang thod pa dag bsnams pa /
T02D1654:204a-11: sna tshogs padmar nyal ba'i ro'i brang la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
T02D1654:204a-12: skyil krung phyed pa bcings pas sgeg pa la sogs pa gar gyi nyams dgus gar mdzad pa /
T02D1654:204a-13: mgrin par mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i phreng ba
T02D1654:204a-14: 'phyang pa mi'i rgyu ma rlon pa'i tshangs skud can
T02D1654:204a-15: / rgyab kyi char stag gi pags pa 'dzin cing mdun gyi char gcer bu 'khor lo can dang /
T02D1654:204a-16: rna rgyan dang mgul rgyan dang dpung rgyan dang gdu bu dang ske rags grol ba dang /
T02D1654:204a-19: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D1654:204a-20: dang zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i ral pa'i thor
T02D1654:204a-21: tshugs can / dpral ba'i mthar thod pa lnga'i phreng ba bcings pa /
T02D1654:204a-22: ro bsregs pa'i thal bas brgyan pa /
T02D1654:204a-23: bcos ma'i khro bas dag po chen po'i sku can /
T02D1654:204a-24: nyi ma shar ka'i dkyil 'khor lta bu spyan gsum pa /
T02D1654:204a-25: h'um yig sgrogs pas bdud kyi sde dregs pa can gyi rgol ba bsdigs shing phye mar mdzad pa /
T02D1654:204a-27: thugs rjes chen po 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i dong du
T02D1654:204a-28: bying ba'i lus can gyi lus 'dzin pa rnams 'don
T02D1654:204a-29: par mdzad pa / rnal 'byor bas dbugs nang du bsdams pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1654:204a-30: gtso bo 'di'i mdza' mo sna tshogs sde ma bcom
T02D1654:204a-31: ldan 'das dang lhan cig kho nar h'um yig las
T02D1654:204a-32: skyes pa gos med pa rus pa'i rgyan can /
T02D1654:204a-33: mi mgo'i phreng ba dor ba dbu skra'i tshogs grol
T02D1654:204a-34: zhing dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba bandu ka'i me
T02D1654:204a-36: sgeg cing g-yo bas rtsen pa'i sku can /
T02D1654:204a-37: mche ba'i myu gu cung zad gtsigs pa'i zhal gcig ma spyan gsum pa /
T02D1654:204a-38: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i gtso bo'i mgul pa la
T02D1654:204b-0: 'khyud pa'i phyag g-yon gyis @204b thod par blugs pa'i
T02D1654:204b-1: gnyug ma'i chu skyes kyi bu ga las byung ba'i
T02D1654:204b-2: me tog gi rgyun gtso bo la ltos pa /
T02D1654:204b-3: srid pa gsum na gnas pa /
T02D1654:204b-4: legs pa'i lam las grol ba'i tshogs la brdeg pa'i
T02D1654:204b-5: tshul gyis gri gug dang bcas pa'i phyag g-yas pa'i
T02D1654:204b-6: snye ma steng du drang po can sh'i ta sgra
T02D1654:204b-7: dang bcas par ma mchu bdud rtsi ster ba la
T02D1654:204b-9: shin tu sgyu rtsal rtsed mo rnams la mkhas pas khu ba 'dzag cing /
T02D1654:204b-10: gtso bo'i yid shin tu 'jam zhing chags par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1654:204b-11: yab yum 'di dag 'grub pa'i dus su phreng bzangs
T02D1654:204b-12: ma la sogs pa rdo rje rol pa mo rnams
T02D1654:204b-13: grub po // de la bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan las shar gyi 'dab ma la legs phreng ma'o //
T02D1654:204b-14: byang du thod pa can ma'o //
T02D1654:204b-17: dbang ldan la sogs pa phyogs bral gyi 'dab ma
T02D1654:204b-18: rnams la g-yas skor du khu ba dang rdul dang
T02D1654:204b-19: bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lngas gang ba'i thod
T02D1654:204b-20: pa rnams so // 'di ni rim pa dang po
T02D1654:204b-21: ste padma 'dab ma brgyad pa rdo rje sngon po'i
T02D1654:204b-23: de nas rim pa gnyis pa rtsibs brgyad dmar po la gnas pa'i padma brgyad de /
T02D1654:204b-24: phyi rol du mngon par gsal ba'i skya ring ltar dmar po'i rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02D1654:204b-25: de'i shar du rtsibs la dge ba'i ska rags ma'o //
T02D1654:204b-27: nub tu rnam par rgyal ma'o //
T02D1654:204b-29: dbang ldan du dus can ma'o //
T02D1654:204b-33: de nas rim pa gsum pa rtsibs brgyad dkar po
T02D1654:204b-34: la gnas pa'i padma brgyad de rdo rje phreng ba
T02D1654:204b-36: de'i shar du rtsibs la rdo rje sgrol ma can ma'o //
T02D1654:204b-40: dbang ldan du dge ba ma'o //
T02D1654:204b-42: bden bral du dus mtshan ma'o //
T02D1654:204b-44: de nas shar gyi sgor padma la mdzes ma'o //
T02D1654:204b-45: byang du padma la nor 'dzin ma'o //
T02D1654:204b-46: nub tu padma la skal ba bzang mo'o //
T02D1654:204b-47: lhor padma la dga' mthong ma'o //
T02D1654:205a-0: 'di rnams thams cad g-yas pa dang @205a * //
T02D1654:205a-1: cig shos kyi phyag gi yal gas gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1654:205a-2: bdag po la sems pas mchu g-yo ba so cung zad ston pa /
T02D1654:205a-3: zhal gcig pa phyogs kyi gos can rus pa'i rgyan can mgo bo'i phreng ba dang bral ba /
T02D1654:205a-4: skra'i tshogs gro la zhing dmar ser gyen du 'bar
T02D1654:205a-5: ba shin tu chags pa las khu ba 'dzag pa
T02D1654:205a-6: / me tog mand'a ra ba kha gsar du bye
T02D1654:205a-7: ba lta bu'i nyi ma'i gzugs rnams la skyil krung
T02D1654:205a-8: phyed pas gar mdzad pa rnams so //
T02D1654:205a-9: sgo skyong ma rnams ni g-yas brkyang gi zla ba'i zhabs stabs kyis so //
T02D1654:205a-10: thams cad kyang stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can thams cad 'od zer 'bar ba /
T02D1654:205a-11: zhal nas khrag gi rgyun 'dzag pa /
T02D1654:205a-13: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi nyams can mngon
T02D1654:205a-14: par gsar ba'i aindra n'i la'i rdo ba bcag pa'i
T02D1654:205a-15: kha dog gi sku dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1654:205a-16: yang na legs par phreng ma la sogs pa bzhi rnams nag mo'o //
T02D1654:205a-17: rim pa gnyis pa ma rnams dkar ser ro //
T02D1654:205a-18: rim pa gsum par bzhugs pa ma rnams ljang gu rnams so //
T02D1654:205a-19: sgo skyong ma'i lha mo rnams nag mo'o //
T02D1654:205a-20: bdag gi bla ma gzhan rnams ni legs phreng ma ni dkar mo'o //
T02D1654:205a-21: thod pa can ma ni ser mo'o //
T02D1654:205a-24: rim pa gnyis pa ma rnams dmar mo'o //
T02D1654:205a-25: rim pa gsum par gnas pa rnams dkar mo'o //
T02D1654:205a-28: skal ba bzang mo dmar mo /
T02D1654:205a-29: dga' mthong ma nag mo ste /
T02D1654:205a-30: rgyud rgyas par gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D1654:205a-31: ji ltar mos pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1654:205a-32: phyogs gnyis pa yang nyung ngu'i rgyud du gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1654:205a-33: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar aom dpral bar h'um /
T02D1654:205a-34: mgrin par hem spyi bor heem phrag pa gnyis la
T02D1654:205a-35: hom mig gnyis la hoom gsang ba la ham lus
T02D1654:205a-36: thams cad la ha: zhes pa go cha'o //
T02D1654:205a-37: de'i rjes su thugs kar h'um nag po las skyes
T02D1654:205a-38: pa'i rdo rje'i lte bar h'um mgrin par a'a: dmar
T02D1654:205a-39: po yongs su gyur ba'i padma la a'a: bde ba
T02D1654:205a-40: chen po'i 'khor lo la aom yig dkar po las
T02D1654:205a-41: skyes pa'i 'khor lo la aom zhes pa thugs dang
T02D1654:205b-2: snying ga'i nyi ma'i rdo rje la gnas pa'i h'um
T02D1654:205b-3: yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis ye shes kyi 'khor
T02D1654:205b-4: lo bkug nas / h'um yig gis bgegs rnams bskrad de /
T02D1654:205b-5: mchod yon phul nas sgo skyong ma bzhi po rnams
T02D1654:205b-6: kyis rim pa ji lta bar dza: h'um bam ho:
T02D1654:205b-7: zhes pas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02D1654:205b-8: bcings shing dbang du byas nas /
T02D1654:205b-9: aom buddha ka p'a li n'i a'a: kham krom drum
T02D1654:205b-10: srum aam aam aam h'um h'um h'um phat phat ces
T02D1654:205b-11: bsgyings pa dang bcas pa brjod cing de dang lhan
T02D1654:205b-12: cig dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur bar
T02D1654:205b-13: blta'o // de nas lte bar gtum mo 'bar bas
T02D1654:205b-14: rim gyis zhu ba'i bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor
T02D1654:205b-15: gnas pa'i bdud rtsis chos kyi 'khor lo'i sa bon
T02D1654:205b-16: 'khrud pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa brgyad
T02D1654:205b-17: kyi rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i ngo bo'i mkha'
T02D1654:205b-18: 'gro ma brgyad po mchod pa'i dus su brjod pa
T02D1654:205b-19: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos la sogs pa'i rgyan
T02D1654:205b-20: can phul du dbyung du med pa'i gzugs dang sgeg
T02D1654:205b-21: pa dang nga la so'i sa gzhir /
T02D1654:205b-22: lo bcu gnyis lon pa shing aa mra'i snye ma
T02D1654:205b-23: dang bcas pa byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i
T02D1654:205b-24: bum pa bsnams pa'i phyag gi yal ga can /
T02D1654:205b-25: zhi zhing 'dzum pa'i 'od zer dang bcas pa rnams spros nas /
T02D1654:205b-27: de'i kho[?] na[?] snying ga'i sa bon gyis 'od zer
T02D1654:205b-28: gyis spyan drangs pa'i phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1654:205b-29: dang / lha mo rnams dang bcas pa de rnams la //
T02D1654:205b-30: yang nas yang du phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1654:205b-31: thal mo sbyar bas gsol 'debs na //
T02D1654:205b-32: thugs rje dang ni ldan pa rnams //
T02D1654:205b-33: bdag la dbang ni bskur du gsol //
T02D1654:205b-34: aom a bhi shinytsa tu m'am sarba yo gi n+yo
T02D1654:205b-35: ma ku te a tra aa dhishthantu a'a gatstshantu h'um
T02D1654:205b-36: sv'a h'a / zhes pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa /
T02D1654:205b-40: gos dang rol mo la sogs pa'i nye bar mkho ba thams cad dang ldan pa /
T02D1654:205b-41: ye shes kyi chus bkang ba'i bum pa dkar po'i
T02D1654:205b-42: phyag can rnams kyis rgyal bar gyur cig / rgyal
T02D1654:205b-43: bar gyis la sogs pas phyi dang nang dang gsang
T02D1654:205b-44: ba dang shes rab dang bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba
T02D1654:205b-45: rnams kyis dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
T02D1654:206a-4: rnga bo che'i sgra dang tsandan dang gur gum dang
T02D1654:206a-5: me tog la sogs pa'i char pa nam mkha'i mthil
T02D1654:206a-6: las 'byung ba'o // de'i rjes su de rnams rtsa de rnams la thim par bya'o //
T02D1654:206a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das dang lha mo rnams rang
T02D1654:206a-8: rang gi rigs kyi 'dren pas rgyas gdab par bya
T02D1654:206a-9: ste / de la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D1654:206a-10: dpa' la sangs rgyas lnga yis cod pan brgyan zhes
T02D1654:206a-12: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga rnams kyis so //
T02D1654:206a-13: sna tshogs sde ma la ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po ming gzhan rdo rje sems dpas so //
T02D1654:206a-14: legs phreng ma la sogs pa bzhi rnams rin chen 'byung bas so //
T02D1654:206a-15: rim pa gnyis par gnas pa rnams 'od dpag med kyis so //
T02D1654:206a-16: rim pa gsum par gnas pa rnams rnam par snang mdzad kyis so //
T02D1654:206a-17: sgo skyong ma rnams don yod grub pas rgyas gdab bo //
T02D1654:206a-18: de nas rtsa brgyad po de las byung ba'i rnal
T02D1654:206a-19: 'byor ma brgyad rnams kyis sngar bzhin du gtso bo
T02D1654:206a-20: la mchod nas / rdo rje dang ni padma 'dus shing ba dud rtsi'i bde rgyas shing //
T02D1654:206a-21: rim gyis yongs gyur sku can sems can don du gar byed pa //
T02D1654:206a-22: rdo rje lha mo'i rtsed mo'i rol pa rtsen mdzad 'gro rmongs la //
T02D1654:206a-23: 'gro la mi dman kun dga' ster ba khyod la bdag 'dud do //
T02D1654:206a-25: 'di ltar bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o //
T02D1654:206a-26: bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das ma'i dga' ba'i
T02D1654:206a-27: sgras bskul ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams byon
T02D1654:206a-28: te rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas zhugs pa
T02D1654:206a-29: zhu ste padma'i nang du babs so //
T02D1654:206a-30: de'i tshe nang gi bdag nyid kyi ye shes lnga'i
T02D1654:206a-31: bdud rtsi lce'i rtse mo'i rol pas rang nyid kyis
T02D1654:206a-32: blangs shing / dkyil 'khor ba'i lha tshim par bya'o //
T02D1654:206a-33: phyi rol du ni yam yig las skyes shing yam
T02D1654:206a-34: gi snying po can ba dan g-yo ba gnyis kyis
T02D1654:206a-35: mtshan pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po la ram
T02D1654:206a-36: las byung zhing ram dang ldan pa 'bar ba bdun
T02D1654:206a-37: pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po la /
T02D1654:206a-38: de'i steng du yi ge gsum las skyes pa'i mgo
T02D1654:206b-0: bo gsum la @206b gnas pa a'a: yig las skyes
T02D1654:206b-2: de'i dbus su zla ba phyed pa dang /
T02D1654:206b-3: thig le dang bcas pa'i bi ra shu ma mu /
T02D1654:206b-4: go ku da ha na yongs su gyur ba'i bdud
T02D1654:206b-5: rtsi lnga dang sha lnga aom h'um kham sv h'um
T02D1654:206b-7: de nas rlung gis bskul ba'i mes gdungs pas thod
T02D1654:206b-8: pa na gnas pa'i rdzas bcu bsros pa'i rlangs bas
T02D1654:206b-9: mtho gang gi bar can gyi steng gi bar snang
T02D1654:206b-10: la h'um las skyes shing h'um gis mtshan pa'i rdo
T02D1654:206b-11: rje sngon po la reg pas zhu nas zhugs pa
T02D1654:206b-12: las thams cad ro gcig par smin pa'i steng du
T02D1654:206b-13: mtho gang gi bar na aom las skyes shing aom
T02D1654:206b-14: yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdud rtsi'i 'od can
T02D1654:206b-15: gyi dkyil 'khor gyi aom yig gi 'od zer gyis
T02D1654:206b-16: bkug pa phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1654:206b-17: pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi
T02D1654:206b-18: rnams dang / nor bu dang sngags dang /
T02D1654:206b-19: sman gyi nus pa'i bye brag rnams dang lhan cig zhugs pa na /
T02D1654:206b-20: de thams cad dngul chu'i mdog can pa mo'i phung
T02D1654:206b-21: po bzhin du bsil ba'i bdud rtsi de nyid gsum
T02D1654:206b-22: gyis lan gsum byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1654:206b-23: des lce h'um dkar po las skyes pa'i rdo rje
T02D1654:206b-24: rtse gcig pa 'od zer dang bcas pa'i sbu gu
T02D1654:206b-25: nas bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams tshim
T02D1654:206b-26: par bya'o zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog
T02D1654:206b-27: ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o //
T02D1654:206b-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba'i mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang /
T02D1654:206b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i sprin spros pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de ;
T02D1654:206b-30: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par bskyed
