T02D1654:210a-20: rdzu 'phrul chen po ba glang gi gdong pa can nam /
T02D1654:210a-21: sha za'i gdong pa can dang /
T02D1654:210a-25: thams cad du mchod rten lta bur bya'o //
T02D1654:210a-27: sa srung dkar po la zhon pa //
T02D1654:210a-28: rdo rje can ser mig stong pa'o //
T02D1654:210a-29: nag mo 'khor lo dbyug to dung //
T02D1654:210a-30: koo stu bha 'dzin mkha' lding gnas //
T02D1654:210a-31: me lha dmar po smin ma dang //
T02D1654:210a-32: ral gtsug sma ra 'bar zhing 'khrug / tshon po rab gnas mi 'jigs dang //
T02D1654:210a-33: bgrang phreng ril pa dbyu gu 'dzin //
T02D1654:210a-34: g-yon brkyang ba yi rkang pa can //
T02D1654:210a-35: dus nag ma he la gnas pa //
T02D1654:210a-36: skra ni gyen du 'bar zhing khros //
T02D1654:210a-37: dbyug pa sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'i lag / de 'dra'i bden bral ro la gnas /
T02D1654:210a-38: gcer bu mi rus kyis brgyan pa //
T02D1654:210a-39: zhal ni mche ba gtsigs pa nas /
T02D1654:210a-40: gri gug thod pa dag 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1654:210a-41: chu srin la ni chu lha dkar //
T02D1654:210a-42: gdengs ka bdun pa sbrul zhags 'dzin //
T02D1654:210a-43: ae na ya ser la gnas pa'i //
T02D1654:210a-44: rlung lha ljang gu rlung ras can //
T02D1654:210a-45: me la gnod sbyin chen po ser //
T02D1654:210a-46: na kul bi dza p'u ra 'dzin //
T02D1654:210a-47: byi bar glang chen gdong can dkar //
T02D1654:210a-48: la phug dbyug to la du phreng //
T02D1654:210a-49: dbang ldan khyu mchog la zhon dkar //
T02D1654:210a-50: ral ba'i thor tshugs rus rgyan can //
T02D1654:210a-51: rtse gsum pas mtshan kha tv'am ga / cang te'u 'dzin pa'i phyag can no //
T02D1654:210a-52: gdengs can brgyad rnams mi'i gdong pa can //
T02D1654:210b-0: rgyan bzang @210b can gang bye brag med //
T02D1654:210b-1: brgya byin la sogs 'di bcu drug / g-yon pas yid 'ong ma la 'khyud //
T02D1654:210b-2: cig shos phyag ni sgeg bcas rnams //
T02D1654:210b-3: shing dang nye bar shes par bya //
T02D1654:210b-4: nyi mar srin po gshin rje ma //
T02D1654:210b-5: gzhan rnams zla bar zla 'od can //
T02D1654:210b-6: dbang ldan gshin rje srin po rnams //
T02D1654:210b-7: ma gtogs rin chen cod pan 'bar //
T02D1654:210b-8: dbang ldan rin chen cod pan can //
T02D1654:210b-9: zhes kyang rdzu 'phrul chen po brgyad //
T02D1654:210b-10: lus stod phyed mthong phyag rnams kyis //
T02D1654:210b-11: thod pa 'dzin par byed pa ste //
T02D1654:210b-12: gzhan gyis byin pa'i gtor ma la //
T02D1654:210b-14: sprin rnams kha dog sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D1654:210b-15: brgyad po 'di rnams rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1654:210b-16: shing mchog gzhan rnams kyis kyang mdzes par byas pas
T02D1654:210b-23: stag la sogs pa rnams kyis 'jigs su rung ba /
T02D1654:210b-24: goo n'a lo sogs pa'i sbrul rnams kyis shin tu breng 'jug pa can /
T02D1654:210b-25: keng rus dang gsal shing gis phug pa dang /
T02D1654:210b-32: rus pa dang mgo bo'i du ma bu la sogs
T02D1654:210b-33: pa rnams kyis 'jigs su rung ba sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1654:210b-34: grub pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa rnams dang /
T02D1654:210b-35: dam tshig spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ba dang /
T02D1654:210b-37: ca co sgrogs pa'i gnod sbyin dang /
T02D1654:210b-39: srin po la sogs pa rnams kyis dang /
T02D1654:210b-40: 'di dang de nas rgyug pa dang /
T02D1654:210b-45: ldang ba rnams kyis shin tu ngo mtshar bar byed
T02D1654:210b-46: pa dur khrod chen po rnams so zhes pa pandi
T02D1654:210b-47: ta aa bha ya ka ra gu ptas mdzad pa
T02D1654:210b-48: 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel sangs rgyas thod pa'i
T02D1654:210b-49: rgyud chen po'i 'grel pa le'u bdun pa'o /
T02D1654:210b-51: // / thabs kyi yan lag rgyas par ston pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:210b-52: shing gis zhes pa rgyud gzhan nas bshad pas so //
T02D1654:210b-53: me tog gis zhes mdor bstan pa rgyas par ston te //
T02D1654:211a-1: par 'gyur ba'i padma la sogs pa me tog lnga rnams so //
T02D1654:211a-2: 'o mas zhes pa nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir mar la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1654:211a-3: nang gi sbyin sreg la ni shes rab ma lnga rnams kyi rdul rnams me tog lnga dang /
T02D1654:211a-4: 'o ma ni skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1654:211a-5: snyoms par zhugs pa na de'i rdul dang bsres par shes par bya'o zhes gzhan du gsungs te /
T02D1654:211a-7: zhi ba zhes pa la sogs pa la 'dir thab gru bzhi pa /
T02D1654:211a-8: rgya dang zabs su sor bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D1654:211a-9: de'i kha'i steng du sor bzhi'i bar dor ro //
T02D1654:211a-10: der phyogs bzhi rnams su rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa kha gyes pa'o //
T02D1654:211a-11: de'i phyi rol du rgya dang dpangs su ser bzhi
T02D1654:211a-12: pa thab khung gi dbyibs can cung zad kha dmar
T02D1654:211a-13: ba kun nas kha khyer te /
T02D1654:211a-14: mtshams rnams su rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa /
T02D1654:211a-15: phyi ngos su rdo rje rtse gsum pa sngon po'i phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02D1654:211a-16: thab kyi dbus su chos 'byung gi dbus su gnas
T02D1654:211a-17: pa'i khang pa brtsegs par padma sor brgyad pa rdo
T02D1654:211a-18: rje phreng ba sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar
T02D1654:211a-20: padma'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa mgo shar
T02D1654:211a-21: du bstan pa sor bzhi'i tshad tsam pa dpangs su
T02D1654:211a-22: sor gcig pa'o // de'i steng du padma'o //
T02D1654:211a-25: khang pa brtsegs pa'i grva rnams su rdo rje rtse dgu pa ser po rnams so //
T02D1654:211a-26: rdo rje kha gyes pa la sogs pa 'di thams
T02D1654:211a-27: cad rdul tshon gyis bris pa yang ngo zhes pa
T02D1654:211a-29: yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste /
T02D1654:211a-30: h'um yig bdag nyid bskyed pa ni h'um las skyes
T02D1654:211a-31: pa'i rang bzhin du mos pa'am h'um gi snying po
T02D1654:211a-32: can no // 'khor lo ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02D1654:211a-34: ae wam m'a ya zhes pa yi ge bzhi las
T02D1654:211a-35: skyes pa'i sa la sogs pa 'byung ba bzhi yongs
T02D1654:211a-36: su gyur par 'khor lo mos par bya'o //
T02D1654:211a-37: lte bas te lte bas mtshon pa'i padmas khyad par du byas pa'o //
T02D1654:211a-38: nyis 'gyur ni bcu drug lhag pa'i nyis brgya'o //
T02D1654:211a-39: kha l'u ka yis zhes pa gur gum gyi bye brag gis so //
T02D1654:211b-0: 'og tu padma zhes pa rdo rje'i 'og tu padma @211b 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
T02D1654:211b-1: sor bcu gnyis ni slob dpon gyi sor mos so //
T02D1654:211b-3: re re'i zhes pa a'a ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:211b-4: dmar ba'i rdo rje thod pa 'dzin //
T02D1654:211b-5: zhes pa dmar ba'i rdo rje dang thod pa'o zhes phyag mtshan no //
T02D1654:211b-7: stong pa nyid ces pa thab kyi dbus su ci yang mi bri ba'o //
T02D1654:211b-8: sha lnga ni go ku da ha na'i shas so //
T02D1654:211b-9: me ni me sngar bshad pa'o //
T02D1654:211b-10: zhi ba la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi khyad par
T02D1654:211b-11: gzhan rnams ni kho bos byas pa'i sbyin sreg gi
T02D1654:211b-12: cho ga 'od kyi snye mar te /
T02D1654:211b-13: 'dir bshad pa'i khyad par dang mi mthun pa spangs nas gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1654:211b-14: 'di thams cad ni kun rdzob tu'o //
T02D1654:211b-15: don dam par ni ci yis bsreg / ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:211b-16: 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u brgyad pa'o /
T02D1654:211b-18: // / rim pa gnyis po mngon du gyur pa na
T02D1654:211b-19: yang spyod pa dang bral na phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1654:211b-20: dngos grub med do zhes pas spyod pa gsungs pa
T02D1654:211b-21: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:211b-22: lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi bya ba khyad par can ni spyod pa'o //
T02D1654:211b-23: rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa'i mtha' las
T02D1654:211b-24: 'das pa nyid kyis na spyod pa gzhan las khyad
T02D1654:211b-25: par du 'phags pa nyid kyi phyir shin tu mchog
T02D1654:211b-26: go // 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid kyis na son pa'o //
T02D1654:211b-27: kha cig tu bud med shin tu mchog gyur zhes
T02D1654:211b-28: klog pa de'i tshe de bzung nas zhes pa lhag
T02D1654:211b-29: ma'o // 'di ni rgod cing g-yengs pa las bab
T02D1654:211b-30: col du mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dngos grub brgyad
T02D1654:211b-32: sa 'og dang mig sman dang rkang pa phyug pa
T02D1654:211b-33: dang ri lu dang mi snang ba dang ral gri
T02D1654:211b-34: dang ro dang bcud len gyi dngos grub rnams sam
T02D1654:211b-35: / dbang phyug gi yon tan brgyad rnams so //
T02D1654:211b-36: 'dis ni nus pa thob pa la 'dod par gyur na /
T02D1654:211b-37: spyod pa rjes su gnang ste /
T02D1654:211b-38: gang las rnal 'byor la dga' ba 'di bag med par mi 'gyur zhing /
T02D1654:211b-39: glags tshol ba rnams kyis kyang 'di la mi tshugs la /
T02D1654:211b-40: 'di rnams tshar gcong pa dang rjes su 'dzin nus par 'gyur zhing /
T02D1654:211b-41: grang ba dang tsha ba la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang zil gyis mi non pa ste /
T02D1654:212a-1: gyi chos brgyad la sogs pas mi gnod pa nyid kyi phyir sgrib pa kun las grol ba'o //
T02D1654:212a-2: gang gi phyir nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid du gyur
T02D1654:212a-3: pa ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ro
T02D1654:212a-4: gcig pa'o // stong nyid la dga' zhes pa slongs
T02D1654:212a-5: mo slong ba'i dus su ster ba po rnams kyis
T02D1654:212a-6: med ces dgag pa byas pa na chos thams cad
T02D1654:212a-7: kyi don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o
T02D1654:212a-8: gcig pa'o // // sgom pa zhes pa thabs sgom pa'o //
T02D1654:212a-9: bla na med pa ni shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1654:212a-10: chos la mchog tu gzhol ba ni gnyis su med
T02D1654:212a-11: pa'i chos de la rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par
T02D1654:212a-12: sbyor ba'o // rdzas zhes pa la sogs pa ji
T02D1654:212a-13: ltar tshogs pa zas kyis tshim pas ji ltar 'dod
T02D1654:212a-14: sbyor ba'o // pa'i yul dang / dus dang skabs
T02D1654:212a-15: kyi khyad par rnams su goms pa'i khyad par las
T02D1654:212a-17: mar me'i sdong bu'i yun ring por bsags pa'i phug
T02D1654:212a-18: gi mun pa bzhin du yun ring por bsags pa
T02D1654:212a-19: yang rnam par rtog pa'i skyon gyi tshogs chen po
T02D1654:212a-20: bsal nas phyag rgya chen po mngon du bya'o zhes
T02D1654:212a-22: spyod pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i zhes pa dang po'i don la drug pa'o //
T02D1654:212a-23: rgyud du ni sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis bar ro //
T02D1654:212a-24: rang bzhin gyis dag ces pa la gal te rang
T02D1654:212a-25: bzhin gyis 'gro ba dag na de'i tshe thams cad
T02D1654:212a-26: kyi tshe kho na 'bad pa med par phyag rgya
T02D1654:212a-28: rnal 'byor goms pas ci bya zhe na /
T02D1654:212a-29: ci rnam par rtog pas nyams zhes brjod pa ma yin nam /
T02D1654:212a-30: de nyid kyi phyir ye shes zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1654:212a-31: tha ma la rnam rtog 'jug las gzhan //
T02D1654:212a-32: srid pa'i sdug bsngal ci yang med //
T02D1654:212a-36: mi 'jigs pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u dgu pa'o /
T02D1654:212a-38: // / gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa lhur byed pa la /
T02D1654:212a-39: de'i thabs bshad pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1654:212a-40: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:212a-41: sems can don gcig rab nges pa //
T02D1654:212b-0: zhes pa gang du sems can gyi don gcig pu legs par nges par bya @212b ba'o ;
T02D1654:212b-1: / gser byed cing rab tu gsal bar byed do zhes pa gser byed do //
T02D1654:212b-3: gang gis zhes pa gser gyis so //
T02D1654:212b-4: mu tig la sogs pa'i nor rnams kyis nor ldan du 'gro ste 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1654:212b-5: 'di'i steng gser de'i phyi rol gyi sman rgyud gzhan
T02D1654:212b-6: du bshad pa rnams med ces mdor ston pa rgyas
T02D1654:212b-7: par ston te / shun lpags zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:212b-8: lcags gzhan gyi zhes pa lcags gzhan no //
T02D1654:212b-9: 'on kyang grub pa'i sman gzhan no //
T02D1654:212b-11: de rnams ci zhes pa ni sman chen po'i mchog de ci yin pa'o //
T02D1654:212b-12: bklags pas grub pa zhes pa gang la bklags pa
T02D1654:212b-13: ste nang gi brjod pas grub pa'i sngags yod pa
T02D1654:212b-15: de yang zhes pa de yang 'grub po //
T02D1654:212b-16: snod du ste shes rab kyi padmar ro //
T02D1654:212b-18: bcud ces bya ba byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1654:212b-20: ro steng gi gnas nas 'og tu 'dren no zhes
T02D1654:212b-21: pas ro bcud ma ni aa wa dh'u t'i ste
T02D1654:212b-23: gzhon nu ma ni dar ma ste lo bcu drug ma'o //
T02D1654:212b-24: de yang zhes pa mo de yang ngo //
T02D1654:212b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams so //
T02D1654:212b-26: skyug bro med pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa med pa'o //
T02D1654:212b-27: skyug bro srid pa ni rdul dang ldan pa las so //
T02D1654:212b-28: mi 'grub ces pa shes rab dang /
T02D1654:212b-29: thabs kyi khu ba dag mnyam pa'i dus su 'phros pa ni dngos grub kyi rgyu'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1654:212b-30: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dren pa'i gnas //
T02D1654:212b-32: dus cung zad bzung bas mnyam par 'phos pas kyang sman chen po ste gser sgrub par byed cing /
T02D1654:212b-33: bar med par bzung bas ni bde ba chen po'i
T02D1654:212b-34: rang bzhin sangs rgyas nyid do zhes pa snying po'i
T02D1654:212b-35: don to // brtan pas bskul bar bya ste /
T02D1654:212b-36: sman chen po de bya ba'o //
T02D1654:212b-38: byugs pa ni khrag gis kyang ngo //
T02D1654:212b-39: der ni ste zla ba la'o //
T02D1654:212b-40: ri rab ni sum yig go //
T02D1654:212b-42: gzhug bya ni 'phang bar bya ba'o //
T02D1654:212b-43: dngos po ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1654:212b-44: g-yon dang g-yas ni rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1654:212b-45: bskum pa ni bya ba'i khyad par ro //
T02D1654:213a-0: bskum pa yang myur du 'pho ba 'dzin pa'i thabs @213a * //
T02D1654:213a-2: 'on kyang gdams ngag las gsal bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1654:213a-3: de ltar ni srog dang thur sel dag lte bar
T02D1654:213a-4: bskum nas man ngag ji lta bar sems brtan pa
T02D1654:213a-5: las sems kyi 'jug pa dbang du byas pa'i byang
T02D1654:213a-6: chub kyi sems rang gi gnas nas dbab pa dang
T02D1654:213a-7: phyir 'gro ba srung ba nyid dang 'phel ba rnams
T02D1654:213a-9: de kho na 'di ro tsa bar byed pa'o //
T02D1654:213a-10: gser la sogs pa 'dod pas ni gtong ngo //
T02D1654:213a-11: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1654:213a-12: lhan cig skyes pa cig car shes rab kyis dang thabs kyis kyang 'phang ngo //
T02D1654:213a-13: zangs srang gcig gi dngos por bcas zhes kha cig go //
T02D1654:213a-14: logs su ni shes rab ma'i g-yon pa'i gzhogs su'o //
T02D1654:213a-15: padma'i nang ngo zhes kha cig go //
T02D1654:213a-16: rgyas par ston pa nyid de nas las zhes pa snyoms 'jug go //
T02D1654:213a-17: ri rab ces pa la sogs pa dang po'i don la drug pa'o //
T02D1654:213a-18: sa bon rgyal po ni hri: yig go //
T02D1654:213a-19: dril bu ni zangs kyi rdog ma'o //
T02D1654:213a-20: shes rab can te lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas
T02D1654:213a-21: snying po la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyis bsrung ba
T02D1654:213a-23: rang nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyis bcom ldan
T02D1654:213a-24: 'das ma'i gzugs kyi gzhon nu ma la 'khyud pas
T02D1654:213a-25: ; rang gi snying gar byang chub kyi sems zla
T02D1654:213a-26: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa grub pa'i bcud ma
T02D1654:213a-27: lus pa khrag dang 'dres pa ste /
T02D1654:213a-28: de'i steng du sa bon sum dang /
T02D1654:213a-29: de'i steng du hr'i: yig bsams nas gsum po 'di
T02D1654:213a-30: 'dod chags chen pos zhu ba mnyam par dga' ba
T02D1654:213a-31: las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems dang lhan cig
T02D1654:213a-32: zhu zhing 'dres par gyur nas padmar lhung ba shes
T02D1654:213a-33: rab ma'i byang chub kyi sems dang rdul dag dang
T02D1654:213a-34: 'dres pa ste / de dron mos zangs ma'am lcags
T02D1654:213a-35: la myur du byugs te me la 'phang bar bya'o
T02D1654:213a-36: 'dres pa ste / zhes so // sangs rgyas tshad ma min pa yang ma yin no //
T02D1654:213a-37: de'i phyir 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1654:213a-38: dngos po gang dang gang zhes pa bshad zin pa dang /
T02D1654:213a-40: tshad min ni tshad ma ma yin par sgro btags pa'o //
T02D1654:213a-41: dmyal ba las mi nyams te mi 'dor ba'o //
T02D1654:213a-42: chos zhes pa la sogs pa chos kyi phung po
T02D1654:213b-0: stong phrag @213b brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi gsang
T02D1654:213b-1: chen bla na med pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
T02D1654:213b-2: 'di'o // gser dang dngul du'ang zhes pa zangs ni
T02D1654:213b-3: gser du dang khab len gyi lcags ni dngul du
T02D1654:213b-5: dang dngul chu sbyangs par ti gcig dang lhan cig
T02D1654:213b-6: zla ba drug tu nyi ma so sor snar blugs
T02D1654:213b-7: 'di'o // 'gyur ro // par bya ste / 'di'i phan yon ni 'tsho'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:213b-8: yang dag sbyor ba ni rdo rje dang padma dag go //
T02D1654:213b-9: bzhi zhes pa rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa gtso
T02D1654:213b-10: bo nyid kyis nam brjod kyang grub pa nyid kyi
T02D1654:213b-11: phyir ro // 'dir bum pa lhag par gnas pa
T02D1654:213b-12: ni le'u bzhi par ji skad bshad pa bzhin no
T02D1654:213b-13: phyir ro // // khyad par gsungs pa /
T02D1654:213b-14: bdag nyid kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1654:213b-15: bdag nyid kyi ming med kyi khrag mo gsham gyi khams kyi gtso bo dang bsres pas so //
T02D1654:213b-16: nag po dmar po 'jigs chen po //
T02D1654:213b-17: zhes pa kha dog nag po dang /
T02D1654:213b-18: dmar po de dag gis 'jigs chen no //
T02D1654:213b-19: nag po bcom ldan 'das dmar ba'i sna tshogs sde mas 'khyud pa ste /
T02D1654:213b-20: 'dir lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1654:213b-21: bla ma kha cig ni nag po yang yin la
T02D1654:213b-22: cung zad dmar ba yang ngo zhes pa shes rab
T02D1654:213b-23: med pa kho na'o zhes gsung ngo //
T02D1654:213b-24: don 'di yin te 'dir slob dpon 'khor dang bcas
T02D1654:213b-25: pa'i he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyis cho ga ji
T02D1654:213b-26: ltar bzhengs pa'i dkyil 'khor ram ras bris kyi dkyil
T02D1654:213b-27: 'khor nye bar spyod pa lngas mchod pa'i shar gyi
T02D1654:213b-28: sgor phyogs bcu'i gtor ma byin pas khrag dang khams
T02D1654:213b-29: kyi gtso bos kha'i nang du byugs pa'i bum pa
T02D1654:213b-30: lnga lhag par gnas pa byas nas mo gsham dkyil
T02D1654:213b-31: 'khor la phyogs pa la rdul gyi rjes thogs su
T02D1654:213b-32: khrus byed pa'i dus su rang nyid langs nas dang
T02D1654:213b-33: por rnam rgyal bum pas snying po'i sngags dang h'um
T02D1654:213b-34: yig bsgyings pa dang bcas par brjod cing khrus bya'o
T02D1654:213b-35: // de'i tshe kho na snying ga'i sa bon gyi
T02D1654:213b-36: 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa'
T02D1654:213b-37: mo dpag tu med pa rnams kyis byang chub sems
T02D1654:213b-38: kyis gang ba'i bum pa lag pa'i yal gas bzung
T02D1654:213b-39: ba rnams kyis khrus byed du 'jug par mdzad do
T02D1654:213b-40: // // de'i cho kho na skyes bu gtum mo
T02D1654:213b-41: shes rab ma med pa'i gcig pu'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1654:214a-1: can ral gri 'dzin pa bzhi rnams kyis cig car
T02D1654:214a-2: ral gris nam mkha' la gdon la sogs pa'i bdud
T02D1654:214a-3: rnams gsod pa'i bsam pas brdeg par bya'o //
T02D1654:214a-4: 'di lta bu'i rim pas bum pa gzhan rnams kyis rim gyis bkru'o //
T02D1654:214a-5: de'i rjes su 'dod pa spyad par bya'o ;
T02D1654:214a-6: / de nas de bu'i mngal dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
T02D1654:214a-10: mi 'jigs pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u bcu pa'o /
T02D1654:214a-12: // / rig pa 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba rgyas par ston pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1654:214a-13: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
T02D1654:214a-14: ; le'u bzhi bar ri skegs kyi byed pa'i cho ga'i snga ma thams cad 'dir rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1654:214a-16: 'di nyid kyis zhes pa 'chad par 'gyur bas so //
T02D1654:214a-17: zin pa zhes pa la sogs pa dus su zin
T02D1654:214a-18: pa gyur pa dug gso ba po thams cad kyis
T02D1654:214a-19: mi nus pas gang gi tshe dus su bzung pa'o
T02D1654:214a-20: zhes dor ba de'i tshe las brtsam mo //
T02D1654:214a-21: lus dkar rnams ni zhes pa bcom ldan 'das dang phyogs kyi lha mo rnams dkar ba ste /
T02D1654:214a-22: mtshams kyi lha mo rnams dmar ba'o //
T02D1654:214a-23: cho ga bzhin du zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum rdzogs par byed pas so //
T02D1654:214a-24: ral gri ni s'a li btags pa las byung ba'o //
T02D1654:214a-25: de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis kyi'o //
T02D1654:214a-27: 'dab ma ni gro ga la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:214a-28: lcug ma ni ka ra w'i ra dkar po'i'o //
T02D1654:214a-29: gcig la zhes pa rig pa 'dzin pa gcig go //
T02D1654:214a-30: ltung ba ni zin pa'i steng du'o //
T02D1654:214a-31: de'i tshe kho na zin pa ldang ngo //
T02D1654:214a-32: de ltar ri skegs kyi byed pa dang chu'i byed pa dang /
T02D1654:214a-33: rig pa 'dzin pa'i byed pa rgyas par bshad de /
T02D1654:214a-34: gzhan byed pa bco lnga rnams ni sangs rgyas thod
T02D1654:214a-35: pa'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis pa rgyas par bstan
T02D1654:214a-36: pa rnams shes par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1654:214a-37: mi 'jigs pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u bcu gcig pa'o /
T02D1654:214a-39: // / mig sman gyi dngos grub mdor bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D1654:214a-40: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:214a-41: gtsor gyur te rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi'o //
T02D1654:214a-42: mthong ba ni mthong ba rnams so //
T02D1654:214b-0: gang rnams @214b zhes pa gang rnams su'o //
T02D1654:214b-1: ma gsungs pa ni rgyud gzhan rnams su'o //
T02D1654:214b-2: skal ba che ni bsngags par 'os pa sta sgrab
T02D1654:214b-3: pa med pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa nyid la
T02D1654:214b-4: sogs pa'i yon tan chen po ston pa'i phyir ro
T02D1654:214b-5: // sems can don la brtson ba nyid las gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1654:214b-6: rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun bskyed ma'o //
T02D1654:214b-7: 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir phyag rgya chen mo'o //
T02D1654:214b-8: rnal 'byor pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
T02D1654:214b-9: kun rnams te thams cad kyi ngo mtshar thob pa'o //
T02D1654:214b-10: gzhan pa'i nus pa nges pa thob nas zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1654:214b-11: rgyal mtshan ni rgyal mtshan lta bu'i mi'o //
T02D1654:214b-12: thab khung ni gru gsum pa'o //
T02D1654:214b-13: de nyid du ni thab tu'o //
T02D1654:214b-14: mgo bos ni mgo bor te thod par ro //
T02D1654:214b-16: gzhan yang ni thod pa gzhan du'o //
T02D1654:214b-17: bgegs kyi zhes pa bgegs rnams so //
T02D1654:214b-18: du ba zhes pa ma lus pa'o //
T02D1654:214b-19: btung bar bya zhes pa rang nyid kyis so //
T02D1654:214b-20: 'thung ngu gzhug ces pa shes rab ma'o //
T02D1654:214b-21: 'dis sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas dur khrod
T02D1654:214b-22: du sbyangs pa'i ma'i rked pa'i rus pa las byas
T02D1654:214b-23: pa'i thab khung gru gsum pa'i steng du de'i thod
T02D1654:214b-24: par de'i 'phongs kyi sha'i mar khus gang ba dur
T02D1654:214b-25: khrod kyi ras kyi sdong bu la dur khrod kyi
T02D1654:214b-27: steng du sbyangs pa'i ma'i thod pa gzhan du sngags zlos shing du ba dbab par bya'o //
T02D1654:214b-28: du ba de sa la ma reg pa dang por lag pa gnyis kyis bzung nas /
T02D1654:214b-29: de'i rjes su lag pa g-yon par bzhag ste /
T02D1654:214b-30: ke li m'a li 'thungs pa'i bu mo skye gnas
T02D1654:214b-31: ma nyams pa rdul 'bab ma sna tshogs sde ma'i
T02D1654:214b-32: gzugs su mos pa la dal bus 'dod pa spyad
T02D1654:214b-33: nas rdul dang 'des pa'i gnyis ka'i byang chub kyi
T02D1654:214b-34: sems cung zad gnyi gas myangs te cha gzhan mang
T02D1654:214b-35: po dang lhan cig g-yas pa'i ming med dang mthe
T02D1654:214b-36: bong dag gis ma nur ro //
T02D1654:214b-37: de nas de kho na'i rdul gyis ri lu brgyad lhag pa'i brgya byas te /
T02D1654:214b-38: ri lu so so la brgyad lhag pa'i brgyar mngon
T02D1654:215a-0: par bsngags nas sngags 'don cing des mig la @215a
T02D1654:215a-1: * // mig sman du bya'o zhes pa tshogs pa'i don to //
T02D1654:215a-2: 'di nyid kyis zhes pa 'di byugs zhes pa la sogs pa dang 'brel lo //
T02D1654:215a-3: dpung pa che ni phyag na rdo rje ste /
T02D1654:215a-4: sems can ma lus pa tshim pa la gzhol ba'i phyag can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1654:215a-5: rnal 'byor ma mchog ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du rnyed sla'o //
T02D1654:215a-6: ming med dang mthe bos zhes pa g-yas pas so //
T02D1654:215a-7: de bzhin du 'og gi mig sman la yang g-yas pa'i bya ba'o //
T02D1654:215a-8: rnal ma zhes pa mig mnyes pa las mig sman ma byugs pa'i gnas skabs bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:215a-9: pheg rdob bdun gyi tshad du 'gyur te ha cang char ches pa bzlog pa'i don du'o //
T02D1654:215a-10: bdag nyid chen po'i zhes pa mthu las zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1654:215a-11: rang gi gzugs ni sgyur ba'i zhes pa dang po'i don la drug pa'o //
T02D1654:215a-12: sbyor ba zhes pa rig pa 'dzin pa nyid la
T02D1654:215a-13: sogs pa 'grub pa'i ched du sbyor ba rnams nyung
T02D1654:215a-14: du'i rgyud du ma gsungs shing rgyas par ni gsungs
T02D1654:215a-15: pa rnams bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
T02D1654:215a-16: sngags bzlas pa'i bye brag la bgrang phreng gi bye brag brjod pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1654:215a-17: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:215a-18: glang chen rus bas te glang po che'i rus pas mngon spyod kyi dus su bzlas so ;
T02D1654:215a-19: ; rus pa chen po ni me'i rus pa'o //
T02D1654:215a-20: bya'i rus pa ni bya rgod kyi rus pa'o //
T02D1654:215a-21: lcags kyis ni lcags kyi bgrang phreng gis so //
T02D1654:215a-22: 'di thams cad ni skyed pa'i phyogs la yang spros pa yin te /
T02D1654:215a-23: de lta de ltar gdul bya'i skye bo'i dor gsungs pa'o //
T02D1654:215a-24: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la ni 'di yis ci zhig ces gsungs pa /
T02D1654:215a-25: sems gcig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:215a-26: sems gcig pu kho na ni khams gsum pa'i dri me long ste /
T02D1654:215a-27: gang phyir des gang bsams pa de gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang bas so //
T02D1654:215a-28: 'di thams cad ni sems kyis sgro btags shing sems
T02D1654:215a-29: de yang don dam par rmi lam gyi ngo bo
T02D1654:215a-30: spros pa thams cad spongs pa ste /
T02D1654:215a-31: rmongs pa gang rnams kyis mi shes pa de rnams
T02D1654:215a-32: la rnam par rtog pa chen po ma tshang ba
T02D1654:215a-34: de rnams thos pa la sogs pa zhes pa yang
T02D1654:215a-35: ste de lta na yang de rnams rnam par rtog
T02D1654:215b-0: pas gzung @215b ba'o zhes pas spros pa med pa'i
T02D1654:215b-1: de kho na nyid sgom pa la chen po sbyor
T02D1654:215b-2: dgongs pas thugs brtse bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1654:215b-3: mi 'jigs pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u bcu gnyis pa'o /
T02D1654:215b-5: // / rim pa gnyi ga la yang de nyid kho
T02D1654:215b-6: na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'o zhes
T02D1654:215b-7: gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:215b-8: rnam dag le'u zhes pa la de kho na nyid
T02D1654:215b-9: rnam par dag pa ni rnam dag yin gyi de
T02D1654:215b-10: kho na nyid ni rnam dag ma yin te /
T02D1654:215b-11: de kho na nyid ni thams cad kyi tshe yod
T02D1654:215b-12: pa'i phyir na thams cad la thams cad kyi tshe
T02D1654:215b-13: rnam par dag par thal bar gyur ba'i phyir ro
T02D1654:215b-14: // de yang thabs kyi de kho na nyid med
T02D1654:215b-15: par mngon du bya bar mi sla'o zhes pa de'i
T02D1654:215b-16: thabs dang ldan pa ji lta bas rdo rje theg
T02D1654:215b-17: pa la brten pas mngon du bya ba de ston
T02D1654:215b-19: sring mo zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1654:215b-20: rnal 'byor ba la sgra ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1654:215b-21: yang na sring mo ni rdo rje theg pa la yang dag par gnas pa'o //
T02D1654:215b-22: de'i bu mo ni tsha mo'o //
T02D1654:215b-23: dbang bskur ster ba mo ni ma'o //
T02D1654:215b-24: bu mo ni mnyes gshin ma'am der gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1654:215b-25: shes rab can ni rnam par dag pa zhes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1654:215b-26: phyag rgya chen mo zhes pa mngon du bya bar ro //
T02D1654:215b-27: 'dis ni thabs las byung ba'i de kho na nyid gsungs so //
T02D1654:215b-28: g-yung mo ni bsam gtan la dga' ba'o //
T02D1654:215b-29: gar mkhan ma ni rab tu spyod pa mkhan ma'o //
T02D1654:215b-30: khrus mkhan ma ni dkar po'i chos la dga' ba'o //
T02D1654:215b-31: gtum mo ni nga rgyal nges par bcom pa nyid kyi phyir bzod pa'i ngang tshul ma'o //
T02D1654:215b-32: dge ba'i 'du byed rdo rje gsum gyi lus can la dga' ba pags pa mkhan ma'o //
T02D1654:215b-33: nang gi shes rab mo'i sring mo ni rkyang ma'o //
T02D1654:215b-34: sring mo'i bu mo ni ro ma'o //
T02D1654:215b-35: skyed ma ni aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1654:215b-36: snga ma dag phyi ma dang bla ma'i man ngag las sbyor ba ni bu mo'o //
T02D1654:215b-37: shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1654:215b-38: rtsa gsum pa de rnams yang dag par sbyor ba
T02D1654:215b-39: las skye ba'i bde ba chen po ni chung du
T02D1654:215b-41: de yi bde ba 'dod mar bshad //
T02D1654:215b-43: sgra'i rnam par shes pa g-yung ma'o //
T02D1654:215b-44: ro'i rnam par shes pa gar ma'o //
T02D1654:216a-1: par shes pa ni 'khrud mkhan ma'o //
T02D1654:216a-2: sna'i rnam par shes pa ni gtum ma'o //
T02D1654:216a-3: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni ko lpags mkhan no //
T02D1654:216a-4: nges pa'i don ni bla na med pa'i shes rab
T02D1654:216a-5: ma sring mo la sogs pa ni le'u dang por
T02D1654:216a-6: bshad zin to // bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag bsags par bya'o zhes pa chung ma'o //
T02D1654:216a-7: stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1654:216a-8: glo bur ba'i spros pa rnams thams cad kyis reg
T02D1654:216a-9: bya ma yin pa nyid kyis na g-yung mo'o //
T02D1654:216a-10: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi
T02D1654:216a-11: gnas pa nyid kyis rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma'i
T02D1654:216a-12: ngo bo'i sprul pa rnams kyis gdul bya rnams la
T02D1654:216a-13: gar byed pa'i phyir gar ma'o //
T02D1654:216a-14: chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa rtogs pa'i rim
T02D1654:216a-15: pas chen po'i chen po la sogs pa'i sgrib pa
T02D1654:216a-16: bag chags dang bcas pa'i dri ma 'khrud pa'i phyir
T02D1654:216a-17: khrus mkhan ma'o // tsanda l'i ni shes rab rdzogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo nges par rtogs pa'o //
T02D1654:216a-18: a'a li ni snying rje chen po'o //
T02D1654:216a-19: de dag ni phul du dbyung du med pa'i go 'phang du 'dren no zhes pa gtum mo'o //
T02D1654:216a-20: srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi rjes su song
T02D1654:216a-21: ba'i ma rig pa'i pags pa 'byed pa'i phyir ko
T02D1654:216a-22: spags mkhan ma'o zhes pa bla na med pa'i shes
T02D1654:216a-23: rab bo // phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi shes rab ma 'di rnams kho na'o //
T02D1654:216a-24: bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi yon tan rnams
T02D1654:216a-25: kyis rjes su byed pa'i phyir shes rab nyid du
T02D1654:216a-26: rtogs par bya'o // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs par 'gyur ba /
T02D1654:216a-27: rnam par ma dag sems sbyangs las //
T02D1654:216a-29: 'dis ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la /
T02D1654:216a-30: phyi'i shes rab ma las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1654:216a-31: nang gi shes rab ma chos kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1654:216a-32: bla na med pa'i shes rab ma phyag rgya chen mo'o //
T02D1654:216a-33: 'di kho nas dag pa mthar thug pa la lhag
T02D1654:216a-34: par gnas pa nyid kyi phyir chos kyi phyag rgya
T02D1654:216a-36: de ni bde ba chen po'i sems kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1654:216a-37: las kyi phyag rgya dang sbyar bas mtshan dang dpe
T02D1654:216a-38: byad kyis rnam par mdzes pa'i sku ni longs spyod
T02D1654:216a-39: rdzogs pa'i sku'o // mtshan ma med par sna tshogs
T02D1654:216b-0: shing mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi @216b 'khor lo
T02D1654:216b-1: la sogs pa'i rnam par sprul pa ni gdul bya'i
T02D1654:216b-2: skye bo skal ldan rjes su 'dzin pa'i dus las
T02D1654:216b-3: mi 'da' ba'i phyir dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang
T02D1654:216b-4: rdzogs pa'i sku'o // sprul pa'i sku'o // phyag rgya
T02D1654:216b-5: chen po khyab par byed pa po ni rang bzhin
T02D1654:216b-7: yang na phyag rgya chen po mtshan dang dpe byad
T02D1654:216b-8: 'bar ba phyag dang zhal dang phyag mtshan la sogs
T02D1654:216b-9: pa dang ldan pa'i ngo bo ni longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1654:216b-10: pa'i sku'o // dam tshig gi phyag rgyas sems kyi
T02D1654:216b-11: rang bzhin so so rang gis rig par bya ba
T02D1654:216b-13: dam tshig ni yang dag par rtogs pa'o zhes byas nas so ;
T02D1654:216b-14: ; chos kyi phyag rgya chos dang longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1654:216b-15: pa'i sku'i byin brlabs las sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa'i
T02D1654:216b-16: chos kyi de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa'i
T02D1654:216b-18: las kyi phyag rgya ni bya ba bsgrub pa'i ngo
T02D1654:216b-19: bo nyid kyi phyir sprul pa sna tshogs pa rnams
T02D1654:216b-20: kyis bya ba phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i phyir
T02D1654:216b-21: sprul pa'i sku'o // bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni
T02D1654:216b-22: phyi rol gyi shes rab ma kho nas mngon par
T02D1654:216b-23: 'dod pa'i lha mo'i gzugs su bsgoms pa ni las
T02D1654:216b-24: sprul pa'i sku'o // kyi phyag rgya'o // rang 'dra
T02D1654:216b-25: ba'i bud med ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes
T02D1654:216b-27: lus la bsgoms pa'i h'um yig la sogs pa yang chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1654:216b-28: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni sa bon la sogs
T02D1654:216b-29: pa las rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor 'dus
T02D1654:216b-30: pa'i lha spro ba dang sdud pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1654:216b-31: byed pa can rnams te mtshan ma yang ngo //
T02D1654:216b-32: rang nyid gtso bo'i lha'i gzugs can ni phyag rgya chen po'o zhes gsal bar byas so //
T02D1654:216b-33: nang gi shes rab ma kho na dbang po dang
T02D1654:216b-34: nyon mongs pa dang yul gyi ngo bor brjod pa'i
T02D1654:216b-35: ched du de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:216b-37: yid ces pa yid kyi nye bar mtshon pa 'dir lus kyi dbang po'o //

T02D1654:220a-28: pa ma grol ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:220a-29: thog ma med pa'i dus can gyi gzugs la sogs
T02D1654:220a-30: par mngon par zhen pa yid la byed pa yongs
T02D1654:220a-31: su bor ba tsam las spong ba yang ma yin
T02D1654:220a-32: te 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la
T02D1654:220a-33: sogs pa las kyang spangs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i
T02D1654:220a-34: phyir ro // gzugs la sogs pa'i yul la the
T02D1654:220a-35: tshom spong ba med par de yid la byed pa
T02D1654:220a-36: yongs su spong bar yang nus pa ma yin te
T02D1654:220a-37: phyir ro // / me ma spangs na tsha ba mi spangs pa bzhin no //
T02D1654:220a-38: de'i phyir the tshom gyi sa bon dang bral ba
T02D1654:220a-39: kho na las gzugs la sogs par mngon par zhen
T02D1654:220a-40: pa la bsal bar bya'i tsher ma gdon par bya
T02D1654:220a-41: ba bzhin du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba
T02D1654:220a-42: nges pa'o // de ltar dngos po dang dngos po
T02D1654:220a-43: med pa dang rang gi dngos po dang gzhan gyi
T02D1654:220b-0: @220b dngos po la sogs par yid la byed pa
T02D1654:220b-1: bsal bas thams cad las yid bsdus te cung zad
T02D1654:220b-3: de de ltar mi sems pa las sngon rnam par
T02D1654:220b-4: spyod pa'i dus kho nar bla ma bsnyen bkur ba'i
T02D1654:220b-5: rnal 'byor pa'i gang bla ma'i drin las rtogs pa
T02D1654:220b-6: kho na'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha
T02D1654:220b-7: rol tu phyin pa skye ste tshad ma dang gzhal
T02D1654:220b-8: bya dang 'bras bu'i cha dang yang dag par bral
T02D1654:220b-9: ba nyid kyis na rang gsal ba'i rang bzhin spros
T02D1654:220b-10: pa med pa nyid kyis ni spros pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1654:220b-11: can 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal gyi tshogs
T02D1654:220b-12: dang bral ba las mchog tu dga' ba'i rang gi
T02D1654:220b-13: ngo bo nyid mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis mngon
T02D1654:220b-14: du rtogs te / de'i mthu las kye ma ma la gti mug gi nus pa /
T02D1654:220b-15: gang gis sems can 'di rnams mya ngan las 'das pa yin yang bdag nyid ma rtogs te /
T02D1654:220b-16: 'di rnams ji ltar rtogs par bya //
T02D1654:220b-18: de'i bdag nyid kho nar 'gro ba mtha' dag la dmigs te /
T02D1654:220b-19: dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo'i snying rje chen po skye'o //
T02D1654:220b-20: de'i bdag can kho na'i rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1654:220b-21: ngo bo bdag dang dngos po thams cad kyi rang
T02D1654:220b-22: bzhin snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid ni /
T02D1654:220b-23: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab ma ming gzhan phyag
T02D1654:220b-24: rgya chen mo dang de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir dbyer
T02D1654:220b-25: med pa'i rang bzhin du blta'o //
T02D1654:220b-26: de'i tshe stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag de'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1654:220b-27: de yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1654:220b-29: so sor sdud dang de bzhin du //
T02D1654:220b-30: bsam gtan srog sdom 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1654:220b-31: rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin te //
T02D1654:220b-33: ces 'dus pa phyi mar gsungs pa'i yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1654:220b-34: de ltar ni gzhon nu ma'i phra phab pa mthong
T02D1654:220b-35: ba bzhin du dbang po rnams stong pa nyid dang
T02D1654:220b-36: ro gcig pas rang gi yul las 'dzin pa ni
T02D1654:220b-39: de yang rtog pa dngos po nges par rtog pa dang /
T02D1654:220b-40: dpyod pa bzhin du dbang po rnams stong pa nyid
T02D1654:220b-41: dang ro gcig pas rang gi yul las 'dzin pa
T02D1654:220b-42: ni / dngos po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid du rnam par dpyod pa dang /
T02D1654:220b-43: de ltar dpyad pa las de kho na nyid la
T02D1654:220b-44: 'jug pa la mngon du phyogs pas gang yin pa
T02D1654:221a-0: bde ba nyid de dga' ba dang de las @221a
T02D1654:221a-1: * // lus shin tu sbyangs pa la sogs pa
T02D1654:221a-2: bde ba chen po dang de ltar goms pa las
T02D1654:221a-3: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gcig pa mthar
T02D1654:221a-4: thug pa'i shes rab kyi bdag nyid sems rtse gcig
T02D1654:221a-5: pa nyid ces pa rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D1654:221a-6: de nas rkyang ma dang ro ma dag 'gags pa'i
T02D1654:221a-7: kun 'dar ma'i lam kho nar 'jug pa dang gnas
T02D1654:221a-8: pa dang 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can gyi srog gi
T02D1654:221a-9: rlung 'jug pa ni srog sdom pa'o //
T02D1654:221a-10: de nas kun 'dar ma las phyir ma byung bar
T02D1654:221a-11: byang chub kyi thig le la sems kyi bzhon pa
T02D1654:221a-12: srog rlung 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang ro gcig
T02D1654:221a-14: de'i tshe yang gtum mo las nges par byung ba
T02D1654:221a-15: cher 'bar zhing ri bong can yang des cher gdungs
T02D1654:221a-17: de'i tshe rdo rje nor bu'i nang du chud pa'i
T02D1654:221a-18: ma nyams pa'i byang chub kyi sems rim gyis rgyu
T02D1654:221a-19: mthun pa la sogs pa'i bde bas rdzogs pa dri
T02D1654:221a-20: ma med pa nyid ji srid par 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:221a-21: de nas 'dzin pa las sems rab tu zhugs pa
T02D1654:221a-22: na mtshan ma so sor snang ba sngon ma can
T02D1654:221a-23: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha mthong ba gzugs brnyan
T02D1654:221a-24: gyi rnam pa can rnam par rtog pa med pa
T02D1654:221a-25: de las 'od zer du ma 'phro zhing /
T02D1654:221a-26: de las khams gsum pa spro ba zhes pa dran pa'o //
T02D1654:221a-27: de nas de kho na rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T02D1654:221a-28: rnal 'byor 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D1654:221a-29: zung 'jug gi bdag nyid ye shes kyi sku rdo
T02D1654:221a-30: rje 'dzin pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni ting nge
T02D1654:221a-32: de ltar rnal 'byor pa gang gi tshe spros pa
T02D1654:221a-33: med pa'i shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid yin
T02D1654:221a-34: pa de'i tshe bsod nams thams cad kyi rang bzhin
T02D1654:221a-35: dang ye shes thams cad kyi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor
T02D1654:221a-36: gyi lha mtha' dag gi bdag nyid dang pha rol
T02D1654:221a-37: tu phyin pa mtha' dag gi rang bzhin du mgon
T02D1654:221a-38: po rnams kyis rnam par gzhag go //
T02D1654:221a-41: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02D1654:221a-42: gang la rnal 'byor pa gnas pa //
T02D1654:221a-43: kun mkhyen bcom ldan dngos su 'gyur //
T02D1654:221a-44: 'di de de nyid dam pa ste //
T02D1654:221a-45: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin zhi //
T02D1654:221a-46: 'di nyid gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1654:221a-47: 'di ni byang chub sems mchog go //
T02D1654:221a-49: 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1654:221b-0: mi gang @221b skad cig gcig tsam yang //
T02D1654:221b-1: byang chub sems ni rab bsgom pa //
T02D1654:221b-2: de yi bsod nams phung po ni //
T02D1654:221b-3: 'di tsam zhes pa bgrang mi nus //
T02D1654:221b-4: nyon mongs med pa'i rin chen sems //
T02D1654:221b-5: 'di ni nor mchog gcig pur brjod //
T02D1654:221b-6: nyon mongs bdud sogs chom rkun gyi //
T02D1654:221b-7: gzhom du med cing dbrog tu med //
T02D1654:221b-9: 'di thams cad la dgongs te gsungs pa /
T02D1654:221b-10: 'di dag sems kyi dag pa nyid //
T02D1654:221b-13: de nyid kyi phyir bde ba chen po'i ngo bo
T02D1654:221b-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa ni 'di kho na sgrub
T02D1654:221b-15: par byed pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
T02D1654:221b-17: 'o na 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo kho na ste /
T02D1654:221b-18: de 'di'i khyad par ci yin zhe na /
T02D1654:221b-19: khyad par yod de de'i ngo bo nyid du bsgrub pa kho na'o //
T02D1654:221b-20: ji ltar dngos por na stong pa nyid dang ro
T02D1654:221b-21: gcig pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa
T02D1654:221b-22: rnams nyan thos kyi tshul la rtogs pa rnams kyang
T02D1654:221b-23: stong pa nyid du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1654:221b-24: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la sgrub pa'i phyir khyad par chen po sgrogs pa bzhin no //
T02D1654:221b-25: 'o na bsam gtan dang po thob pa rnams kyang
T02D1654:221b-26: 'khor los sgyur ba rnams bzhin du bde ba nye
T02D1654:221b-27: bar ston na / bdag med pa gnyi ga rtogs pas ci bya /
T02D1654:221b-28: da ltar ni dga' ba lhag pa kho na las
T02D1654:221b-29: dang pos ni rab tu dga' bar brjod do zhe
T02D1654:221b-30: na bden te / 'di lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba ni ma yin zhing /
T02D1654:221b-31: de nyid kyi phyir bde ba chen po ma yin la /
T02D1654:221b-32: las dang po pa'i gnas skabs su thabs su gyur pa yang ma yin te /
T02D1654:221b-33: khab kyi bug pa ni bu gzhes pa nam mkha'
T02D1654:221b-34: dang mnyam pa nyams su myong ba ma yin pas
T02D1654:221b-35: so // 'o na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1654:221b-36: phyin par gang bla na med pa yang dag par
T02D1654:221b-37: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba'o zhes gsungs pa
T02D1654:221b-40: 'di'i thabs bstan pa ni ma yin te /
T02D1654:221b-41: thabs su gyur ba lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po nye bar ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1654:221b-42: de nyid kyi phyir de yang rim pa 'di kho nas go bar bya'o //
T02D1654:221b-43: de ci pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la byang chub med dam zhe na /
T02D1654:221b-45: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bla na
T02D1654:222a-0: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @222a
T02D1654:222a-1: * // kyi dri yang ci las yin /
T02D1654:222a-2: mthar thug pa ni yang nges par thabs 'di la
T02D1654:222a-3: ltos so zhes brjod par bya'o zhes pa shin tu
T02D1654:222a-5: man ngag rig pa rnams kho nas khyad par 'di yongs su gsal bar shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:222a-6: bde ba chen po sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis
T02D1654:222a-7: na gtso bor yul reg bya dang de'i dbang po
T02D1654:222a-8: dang de'i rnam par shes pa snying rje la sogs
T02D1654:222a-9: pa'i ngo bo dang shes rab lnga'i ngo bor yang
T02D1654:222a-10: sgrub pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1654:222a-11: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:222a-12: phyi rol gyi shes rab ma'i lus yul dang /
T02D1654:222a-13: de dang sbyor ba las nang gi lus dang ye shes dag sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1654:222a-14: gang 'gyur ba de ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:222a-15: lta dang ldan pa zhes pa bud med mchog mthong ba ni snying rje ste /
T02D1654:222a-17: 'khyud pa byams pa ste bde ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1654:222a-18: dbang po gnyis drud pa las dga' ba ste bde ba dang mi 'bral ba'o //
T02D1654:222a-19: byang chub sems 'gyur ba las btang snyoms te rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
T02D1654:222a-20: de bzhin du ni nang gi lus dang shes pa
T02D1654:222a-21: dag snying rje la sogs pa'i ngo bo dag go
T02D1654:222a-22: // de ltar gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1654:222a-23: zhes pa'i snying rje la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i phyag
T02D1654:222a-24: rgya chen po dang ldan pa 'dod chags la sogs
T02D1654:222a-25: pa rnams kyis 'ching ba ma yin no //
T02D1654:222a-26: phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor med na 'gro ba 'ching ngo zhes gsungs pa /
T02D1654:222a-27: mthong ba las zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:222a-28: cung zad lhag pa ni de'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D1654:222a-29: kun gyi mtha' ste 'gyur ba las so //
T02D1654:222a-30: de ltar dga' ba dang skyo ba 'bras bur gsungs so //
T02D1654:222a-31: khams gsum pa skyes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi
T02D1654:222a-32: snying rje la sogs pa rnams kyang grol ba'i rgyu'o
T02D1654:222a-35: yang dag pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:222a-36: dngos po gsum zhes pa yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1654:222a-37: de ltar goms pa lhur len pas //
T02D1654:222a-38: ji ltar tshogs pa'i bza' ba 'dus //
T02D1654:222a-40: gang zhes pa la sogs pa bshang ba dang gci
T02D1654:222a-41: ba la sogs pa bdud rtsi dang sgron ma lnga
T02D1654:222a-42: la rang bzhin gyi bdud rtsir brtag go //
T02D1654:222b-0: 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi @222b de'i dga' rtsed la sogs pa yang ngo //
T02D1654:222b-1: phyag rgya chen po yang phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bor blta bar bya ste /
T02D1654:222b-2: 'di 'dra'i sgom dang ldan pa ni 'grub bo //
T02D1654:222b-4: lnga zhes sring mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma rnams so //
T02D1654:222b-5: dpal dang phyag rgya che ster byed //
T02D1654:222b-6: ces pa rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs
T02D1654:222b-7: pa'i mtshan nyid ni dpal te phyag rgya chen po
T02D1654:222b-12: ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa 'dod par bya'o //
T02D1654:222b-13: 'o na 'di rnams mchod pa mchog ni 'dod pa byed pa kho na ste /
T02D1654:222b-14: de yang skyon yin no zhe na skyon min te gang gi phyir mi gos pas so //
T02D1654:222b-15: 'o na 'dod pa byed pa kho na gos pa'o zhen ma yin te /
T02D1654:222b-16: gang gi phyir phrag dog la sogs pa rnams dang ldan pa ni gos par brjod na /
T02D1654:222b-17: rnal 'byor pa de la phrag dog la sogs pa'i
T02D1654:222b-18: nyes pa de rnams kyis 'di la gnod pa ma
T02D1654:222b-19: yin no // 'o na ji ltar 'di 'dra ba'i mchod pa ni ches mchog tu gyur pa dang /
T02D1654:222b-21: sgro btags pa'i khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T02D1654:222b-22: sgro btags pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1654:222b-23: de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo dang de kho na nyid ma yin pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1654:222b-24: de la de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo'i bdag
T02D1654:222b-25: nyid kyi sgro btags pa ni ma la sogs par
T02D1654:222b-26: sgro btags pa bzhin du brgyud nas byang chub sgrub
T02D1654:222b-27: par byed pa'i phyir nyes pa med do //
T02D1654:222b-28: 'o na 'ga' zhig gi nyams su myong ba yang
T02D1654:222b-29: bkag pa nyid kyi phyir 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe
T02D1654:222b-31: las ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1654:222b-32: kun nas bslang bar bya ba dang /
T02D1654:222b-33: kun nas slong ba po'i dbye bas so //
T02D1654:222b-34: de la lus dang ngag gi las thams cad kun nas bslang bar bya ba ste /
T02D1654:222b-35: yid kyis ni kun nas slong pa po'o //
T02D1654:222b-36: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1654:222b-37: ma chags pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo dang /
T02D1654:222b-39: de la chags pa la sogs pas kun nas bslang
T02D1654:222b-40: ba'i lus dang ngag gi las thams cad mi dge
T02D1654:222b-41: ba ste de yang bkag pa'o //
T02D1654:222b-42: ma chags pa la sogs pas kun nas bslang ba thams cad ni dge ba kho na'o //
T02D1654:222b-43: phyag rgya chen po gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1654:222b-44: dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni mtha' dag ma
T02D1654:222b-45: chags pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid 'gro ba la
T02D1654:223a-2: des na 'di spyod lam thams cad dang ldan yang
T02D1654:223a-3: mi dge ba mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D1654:223a-4: phyir dge ba'i bdag nyid kho na'o zhes gsungs pa
T02D1654:223a-5: / rnal 'byor pa de zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:223a-6: de kho na nyid ni phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1654:223a-7: de'i phyir 'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams kyis mi gos so //
T02D1654:223a-8: de'i phyir shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin gnyis
T02D1654:223a-9: su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa kho
T02D1654:223a-10: na sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba legs
T02D1654:223a-12: de 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1654:223a-13: 'di ni theg pa che mchog ste //
T02D1654:223a-14: 'di ni byang chub sems mchog go //
T02D1654:223a-15: mnyam par gzhag rnams 'bad pa yis //
T02D1654:223a-16: byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis //
T02D1654:223a-17: 'khor ba rang gzhan don sgrub la //
T02D1654:223a-18: byang chub sems las ma gtogs pa'i //
T02D1654:223a-19: thabs gzhan sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni //
T02D1654:223a-20: sngon chad gzigs pa nam yang med //
T02D1654:223a-23: de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis phyag 'os //
T02D1654:223a-24: de las byung ba'i rnal 'byor ni //
T02D1654:223a-25: mtha' yas pa rnams rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1654:223a-26: de kho na las ting nge 'dzin //
T02D1654:223a-27: mtha' yas pa las yang dag 'byung //
T02D1654:223a-28: phyag rgya dkyil 'khor sngags rnams ni //
T02D1654:223a-29: rnal 'byor de las rnam dag nyid //
T02D1654:223a-30: zhi ba rgyas pa nyid kyis las //
T02D1654:223a-31: sngags las skyes pa gzhan gang yang //
T02D1654:223a-32: dza hu'i bu mo'i bye ma'i grangs //
T02D1654:223a-33: ji snyed dngos grub phra rnams dang //
T02D1654:223a-34: phyag rgya'i dngos grub gzhan nyid rnams //
T02D1654:223a-35: ji snyed sa la rnam grangs pa //
T02D1654:223a-37: thugs kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa yin //
T02D1654:223a-38: gang yang nges 'byed cha mthun pa //
T02D1654:223a-39: rnam pa bzhi dang sa bcu dang //
T02D1654:223a-40: 'bras bu la gnas de thams cad //
T02D1654:223a-43: 'byung bzhin pa yi rgyal ba'i sras //
T02D1654:223a-44: 'jig rten dbang sogs sems dpa' che //
T02D1654:223a-45: de rnams kyang 'di kho nar gnas //
T02D1654:223a-46: 'das dang ma byon sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1654:223a-47: da ltar byung bar 'dod gang dang //
T02D1654:223a-48: bse ru nyan thos dge 'dun te //
T02D1654:223a-49: de rnams kyang ni 'di las byung //
T02D1654:223a-50: rnal 'byor spyod dang bya ba yis //
T02D1654:223b-0: dbye bas ji snyed @223b sprul pa 'byung //
T02D1654:223b-1: de snyed thams cad rnal 'byor ni //
T02D1654:223b-3: kun du brtags pa'i ngo bo ni //
T02D1654:223b-4: bag chags stobs las byung rnams dang //
T02D1654:223b-5: ji srid brten dang g-yo ba'i dngos //
T02D1654:223b-6: de snyed de la brten pa'o //
T02D1654:223b-8: 'dod pa lnga rnams med na stong pa nyid ni
T02D1654:223b-9: ro bro ba med pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1654:223b-10: gsungs pa // ji srid ces pa la sogs pa de /
T02D1654:223b-11: ji srid du yul gyi bcud rnams kyis byang chub
T02D1654:223b-12: kyi myu gu skyong bar mi byed pa de srid
T02D1654:223b-13: du / sangs rgyas kyi dpag bsam gyi shing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
T02D1654:223b-14: chu brtan ba dang bral ba'i myu gu las shing phun sum tshogs pa bzhin no //
T02D1654:223b-15: de sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1654:223b-16: sems kyi myu gu shin tu chung ba ni //
T02D1654:223b-17: lus bcud dag pas gal te mi bran na //
T02D1654:223b-18: nam mkha' khyab pa'i 'bras bu sbyin pa yis //
T02D1654:223b-19: dpag bsam shing nyid ji ltar thob par 'gyur //
T02D1654:223b-21: 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u bcu gsum pa'o /
T02D1654:223b-23: // / mngon par 'dod pa'i bla na med pa'i don
T02D1654:223b-24: bstan pas rab tu dang ba phul du byung ba
T02D1654:223b-25: skyes pas ji ltar stong pa de ston pa'i ched
T02D1654:223b-26: du gsungs pa / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:223b-27: bde ba chen pos rnam par brtse ba'i phyir lha mo'o //
T02D1654:223b-28: skyed byed ma ni lam gyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1654:223b-29: dpal mo ni rtogs pa dang /
T02D1654:223b-30: spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'bras bu'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1654:223b-31: rigs med pa rnams cher skrag pa'i gnas nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa'o //
T02D1654:223b-32: grags chen ma ni rnam par thos pa'i grags can no //
T02D1654:223b-33: byams pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir mnyes gshin ma'o //
T02D1654:223b-34: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa mtha' yas
T02D1654:223b-35: pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i phyir lha
T02D1654:223b-36: mo'o // snying rje chen po dang shes rab chen
T02D1654:223b-37: po dag las tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1654:223b-38: phyag rgya chen po ste 'di dag gis rang don
T02D1654:223b-40: don chen 'bras bu ston mdzad ma //
T02D1654:223b-41: don chen ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02D1654:223b-42: de kho na la ma goms pa'i 'bras bu dam pa ste /
T02D1654:223b-43: de gdul bya rnams la ston no zhes pa gzhan don phun sum tshogs pas bstod par byed do //
T02D1654:223b-44: ston pa'i yul gyi sgo nas bstod de /
T02D1654:223b-45: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:224a-0: sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa @224a * //
T02D1654:224a-2: gang rnams kyis zhes pa dngos grub gang zhig byang
T02D1654:224a-3: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang spyod yul ma yin
T02D1654:224a-4: pa'o // lha mo zhes pa lha mos so //
T02D1654:224a-5: gsung gcig gis zhes pa thog mar go dka' ba
T02D1654:224a-6: brjod nas tshig gzhan gyis gsal bar byas pa ni
T02D1654:224a-7: ma yin pa'o // chen po'i snod ni chen po 'jig rten pa dang /
T02D1654:224a-8: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rnams kyi snod do //
T02D1654:224a-9: kun zhes pa rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1654:224a-10: gang rnams ni gang dngos grub de'o //
T02D1654:224a-11: gsungs pa ni sna tshogs sde mas so //
T02D1654:224a-13: sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ni stobs dang /
T02D1654:224a-14: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D1654:224a-15: de rnams kyang bdag la bzod mdzod cig ste /
T02D1654:224a-16: gang gi phyir de rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
T02D1654:224a-17: bdag nyid ni rgyal ba mchog rnams kyi gdul bya
T02D1654:224a-19: shin tu rnyed dka'i don shin tu sbas pa'i spyod
T02D1654:224a-20: yul can gyi rgyud 'dir bdag gis gsal bar byas
T02D1654:224a-21: pa'o // de'i phyir bdag gi sgo nas de rnams kho nas 'di bstan pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1654:224a-22: bdag la yang phyin ci log tu bstan pa'i gnod
T02D1654:224a-23: pa sgro btags pa las mi bzod pa bya ba
T02D1654:224a-25: rgyal ba mchog rnams bzod mdzod cig / ces rnam dbye ba sgyur ba'o //
T02D1654:224a-27: dbang bskur rnams kho na 'di la dbang du bya'o zhes bstan pa'i ched du dbang bskur gsungs pa /
T02D1654:224a-28: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:224a-29: gsol ba gdab ste gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur gyi don du'o //
T02D1654:224a-31: bcad ces pa khyod kyis so //
T02D1654:224a-32: g-yogs zhes klog pa la ni khyab par byed pa ste bdag la'o //
T02D1654:224a-34: ces 'di ltar shes rab ma mgu bar bya ba la 'bad ce na gsungs pa /
T02D1654:224a-35: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni mchod //
T02D1654:224a-36: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs dag tu las kyi
T02D1654:224a-37: phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor kho nas phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1654:224a-38: dngos grub bo zhes pa mang ngag go //
T02D1654:224a-39: ji ltar na 'di ltar yin zhes gsungs pa /
T02D1654:224a-40: 'di kho na la ste shes rab ma la sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams bzhugs te /
T02D1654:224a-41: de rnams bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rnams yin zhing //
T02D1654:224a-42: de'i rten yang shes rab ma ste /
T02D1654:224b-0: @224b de las cho ga ji lta bar shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur blang bar bya'o //
T02D1654:224b-1: de nyid kyi phyir shes rab ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bo gsal bar byed de /
T02D1654:224b-2: dbang po zhes pa la sogs pa dbang pos nye
T02D1654:224b-3: bar mtshon pa las yul la sogs pa yang ngo
T02D1654:224b-4: // bdag ces pa bdag gi sems te /
T02D1654:224b-5: sems ni bdag ces brtags pa'o zhes pa'i gsungs las so //
T02D1654:224b-6: yang na bdag tu gdags pa'i yul nye bar len
T02D1654:224b-7: pa'i phung po lnga rnams bdag 'di thams cad rang
T02D1654:224b-9: gang du nye bar mi dmigs pa de mchog tu dga' ba rtogs pa'o //
T02D1654:224b-10: mchog dga' ba ni 'dir lhan cig skyes pa'i dga'
T02D1654:224b-11: ba kho na dang ming gzhan shes rab ye shes
T02D1654:224b-12: te / dbang po la sogs par sgro btags pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1654:224b-13: de brtag pa gnyis pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1654:224b-14: mchog tu dga' ba thob na ni //
T02D1654:224b-15: sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la //
T02D1654:224b-17: 'char ba'i rim pa kho nas 'di'i yang dag 'thob rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1654:224b-18: de'ang le'u dang por dpyad zin to //
T02D1654:224b-19: mchog tu dga' ba kho na la rgyud nyid kyis phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1654:224b-20: de la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1654:224b-21: gang zhig shar bas ni lhan cig skyes pa gang shar bas so //
T02D1654:224b-23: gang yang goms pa las nges par 'byed pa'i chal
T02D1654:224b-24: phan pa la sogs pa rtogs pa'i rim gyis mngon
T02D1654:224b-25: dga' ste / kun nas mngon par shes pa dang /
T02D1654:224b-26: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa phul du
T02D1654:224b-27: byung ba'i yon tan rin chen rnams yang dag par
T02D1654:224b-28: 'byor ba ni / rgyal ba rnams kyis nyon mongs
T02D1654:224b-29: pa'i rnyog pa ma lus pa dang bral ba'i phyir
T02D1654:224b-30: 'byor ba ni / mdzes pa / kun du bzang
T02D1654:224b-31: po mchog tu dgyes par gnas pa'i sku ste sku
T02D1654:224b-32: bzhi pa rdo rje 'chang mkhas pa yang dag par
T02D1654:224b-33: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs la /
T02D1654:224b-34: de'i bdag nyid du rnam par rtog pa'i g-yeng ba ma lus pa spangs ba'i phyir sbas te /
T02D1654:224b-35: tshig dang blo'i spyod yul ci yang ma yin pa'o //
T02D1654:224b-36: de nyid kyi phyir 'di rtogs nas /
T02D1654:224b-37: sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa rnams mi smra bar gyur nas gnas par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1654:224b-38: gcig pu ni gnyis su mad pa'i mchog tu dga' ba ste /
T02D1654:224b-39: sgrib pa thams cad kyi bag chags lhag ma'i gnyid dang bral ba'i phyir sad pa ste /
T02D1654:225a-2: de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis shes rab ye
T02D1654:225a-3: shes de nyid khyad pa ra ngo bor chu'i rlabs
T02D1654:225a-4: kyi ngo bo bzhin du byung ba ni dbang bzhi
T02D1654:225a-6: de 'di bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rdo rje
T02D1654:225a-7: 'dzin pa ni rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'o zhes
T02D1654:225a-8: pa'o // 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so /
T02D1654:225a-10: // / ha ru ka dpal dpa' bo'i lam ni rnam par bkral las dge ba cher byung bas //
T02D1654:225a-11: 'khor ba'i 'khrul mang bcad nas 'gro 'dod de yi
T02D1654:225a-12: dkyil 'khor du ni 'du bar shog / bdag ni
T02D1654:225a-13: thub pa 'di yi mtha' yas sku ni yun ring
T02D1654:225a-15: srog chags so so la gzhol che ba'i bde ba
T02D1654:225a-16: spros pa 'jigs pa 'dzin gyur cig / rnam gnon
T02D1654:225a-18: 'jigs pa med pas gnad reg tshig / dga' ba skyong gi rgyal srid lo //
T02D1654:225a-19: nyi shu lnga la 'di byas so //
T02D1654:225a-20: srid gsum rnam rgyal phun tshogs sa gzhi ma nyams sku can gyis //
T02D1654:225a-21: 'gro la chung min phan bya'i ched du bsags pa yi //
T02D1654:225a-22: ma ga dh'a bdag sras po dpal ldan gnod sbyin skyong gi mthu //
T02D1654:225a-23: brtan pa yongs 'gyur ched du des don gnyer las 'di gzhung byas //
T02D1654:225a-24: dga' ba'i bde sbyin gnyis med dam pa'i bcud kyi
T02D1654:225a-25: rol pas 'phrul ba'i sa gzhi rdo rje btsun mo
T02D1654:225a-26: ni // rtsen pa shes rab dpal 'dis thub pa'i
T02D1654:225a-27: tshogs kyis bkod pa bsgrigs pa'i them skas phreng ba
T02D1654:225a-28: ni // gang gi gnas // ma byas byas don
T02D1654:225a-29: don gnyer yang dag rtog pa'i stobs can du ni
T02D1654:225a-30: rgyal mdzad gyur cig de yi yang //
T02D1654:225a-31: kho bos bkral bas mnyam med dge ba bdud rtsis
T02D1654:225a-32: gang ba don du gnyer bya'i tshim pa 'byung gyur
T02D1654:225a-33: cig / tshigs bcad brgya phrag bcu drug ni //
T02D1654:225a-34: rkang bcas 'di ni sdom pa'i tshad //
T02D1654:225a-35: mkhas pa rnams kyi rgyan ched 'di'i //
T02D1654:225a-36: tshad bzhin snying la dngos po nyid //
T02D1654:225a-37: ces pa dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po'i
T02D1654:225a-38: 'grel pa mi 'jigs pa'i gzhung 'grel gnas brtan mkhas
T02D1654:225a-39: pa aa bha ya ka ra gu ptas mdzad pa
T02D1654:225a-41: /'di ni sngon lo ts'a ba mkhas pa zhig gis bsgyur ba la //
T02D1654:225a-42: bar skabs su dpe stor bas ma tshang ba las /
T02D1654:225a-43: dpang lo ts'a dge slong blo gros brten pas spyi
T02D1654:225b-0: bo lhas pa mkhan po 'jam @225b dpal ser po'i
T02D1654:225b-2: le'u dang por bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po rdo rje zhes pa nas /
T02D1654:225b-3: 'og gi lam nas byung zhes pa'i bar dang /
T02D1654:225b-4: lha'i sku bsgom pa kho na gsungs te /
T02D1654:225b-5: gang gsungs pa zhes pa nas brtan pas gzhi la
T02D1654:225b-6: sogs pa rnams dang g-yo ba zhes pa'i bar dang
T02D1654:225b-7: / le'u gsum pa'i mjug he ru ka'i gzugs su
T02D1654:225b-8: bsgom pa rdzogs pas zhes pa nas le'u bzhi pa'i
T02D1654:225b-9: tha ma la ni 'dir ma rig pa ste des
T02D1654:225b-11: le'u bcu gsum pa'i dbu'i de kho na nyid ni
T02D1654:225b-12: thams cad la zhes pa nas le'u bcu bzhi pa'i
T02D1654:225b-13: mjug na gang zhig shar bas ni zhes pa'i bar
T02D1654:225b-14: dang / srid gsum rnam rgyal zhes pa la sogs
T02D1654:225b-15: pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis rnams hor kor bsabs shing lhag
T02D1654:225b-16: ma rnams la zhu chen bgyis nas bsgyur cing gtan
